story:
Who Are You and What is Salt Assault?

My name is Ryan Dombrowski, founder of Doombrowski and creator of Salt Assault. I've been working on tabletop games and video games very heavily for about 3 years now and feel that I finally have something that's ready to be shared with the world. 

Salt Assault is a game designed to make people laugh. It lets people feel the power of controlling an argument and putting the icing on top of a successfully won argument with a myriad of insults. It's a game that has been tested to many crowds with abundant laughter every playthrough. You get to tell people to F*** Off, call people names like A**hat, and make people salty. What's not to love?

By helping fund Salt Assault, you will be bringing my childhood dream of producing a card game to life. If this campaign is successfully funded, the game will be able to be printed and distributed across the nation. That would be super awesome. Be warned that if this game is successfully funded, I will probably cry like a little b****.

How Do I Play?

Check out the video below. It explains the basics. 
 

Why $4000? That's a kind of weird number.

$4000 is the number needed to print and package the first wave of decks for Salt Assault. When printing games, large quantities are necessary to keep the finished product affordable. I have price checked multiple print shops and am confident that with $4000, I can have enough copies printed to hit a good price point on the finished product. 

If you help fund Salt Assault, you will be given instant access to a pdf version of the game. You can print and play right away! Your name will also be included in a special backer section of the Salt Assault game webpage. Copies of the game will also be available at and above the $15 donation mark if the game is successfully funded.

If for whatever reason the $4000 goal is not reached, any funds gained will go into the Doombrowski LLC account to be put towards future game making and distributing endeavors. It's very possible that, depending on the amount gained, I will still find a way to make this game happen. Regardless if the game is printed or not, you will have access to the pdf of the game so you can still print and play it. :)

Sprinkle the Salt

I love making people laugh. Laughter feels good. This game is a possible way to spread the joy of laughter to the masses. I've taken many hours to create a good balance of humor, vulgarity, and strategy to try and make the best gut busting card game that I can out of this idea.

If funded well enough and enough groundswell gets behind this project, I may just be able to pursue game development full time. That's the dream I've been chasing for many years. I have proven my game design chops on small stages (Suburban Scavengers - Otronicon 2016 Best Narrative Award) and am ready to bring it to the big time.

How Do I Know You'll Deliver?

You can ask anybody that knows me and they will tell you that I am a driven individual. I work hard and always have the best interest of customers (in this case, backers) in mind. 

I have over 6 years of business management experience and over a year of experience filling and shipping orders nationally. I've also managed Doombrowski LLC for the last 2 years while maintaining a full time job. If the goal is reached, this game will be made. Period.

What if I Have No Money to Help Fund Salt Assault?

Spreading the word about Salt Assault is a huge help and is necessary to reach the amount of funding needed for production. Posting that you're interested in the game and sharing on your favorite social media outlets are a few ways that can help out a bunch. Link the campaign video or use some of the fine Indiegogo sharing features to let people know all about the Saltiest card game this side of the Milky Way. The time that you spend spreading the word about Salt Assault is definitely valuable and appreciated.

Stretch Goals

$7000

A special booster pack with 12 extra insult cards and 4 extra negate cards, voted on by the indiegogo backers.

Thanks for reading and I hope to share Salt Assault with you very soon.

_Doombrowski

story:
What is Lenormand? And who is Little Lulu?

Lenormand is a 200 year-old card divination system similar to Tarot... but much simpler and more suited to practical everyday life matters!

  • 36 card deck featuring simple key images and associated meanings.
  • No knowledge in Tarot, astrology, or other esoteric systems necessary.
  • Straightforward and beginner-friendly; penetrating and insightful.

Who is Little Lulu though? Vintage Lenormand decks would often come with a small guidebook written by a celebrated psychic or card reader of the time. Little Lulu is a sassy, contemporary homage to these Lenormand sages (both real and fictional) of the past.

What I Need & What Little Lulu Will Deliver

Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand is ready to be printed in its first full edition. Yay! But printing a full edition of custom decks in a cost-effective number is expensive... yikes! (See FAQ's)  So to help get Little Lulu out into the world I'm asking for your support:

  • The total budget from start to finish for the first edition of Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand is $7280. I have already invested $900 of my own funds into the initial design, proofing, and marketing stage. I am hoping to cover the remaining $6780 of printing and production costs through pre-sales and your support of this Indiegogo campaign. 
  • Through this campaign you can pre-order a copy of the Little Lulu Lucky Lenormand first edition for $4 off the retail price. There's also a special "Game of Hope" package that presents Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand in a satin bag with a custom spread cloth, 2 beautiful dice, and rules to the Victorian-era game that the first Lenormand deck was based on!
  • I have a super big wish goal above and beyond the initial goal... if we can surpass the initial goal and reach the stretch goal too, I may be able to have every copy of Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand include the dice and game instructions for "The Game of Hope!" FINGERS CROSSED!!!

The Impact

I am an artist and Tarot card reader based in Kansas City. I am passionate about the history of cartomancy (the art of reading cards) and designing card decks for a variety of purposes. Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand is my second completed original deck and will be the first deck I've produced for sale through shops and local retailers:

  • Lenormand is an incredibly useful and insightful card system and Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand reflects a contemporary sensibility with the classic structure of the original deck.
  • My first complete original deck was The Paris Tarot which I funded a VERY small edition of here through Indiegogo in 2017! Aw... The Paris Tarot is a toddler now!
  • I am a full-time Tarot reader and artist. I am writing publications on cartomancy as well as designing new decks that are versatile and can be used as playing card games with introspective meditation-style readings. Cartomancy is a living and evolving art form and I'm so grateful to have the opportunity to contribute to its continuation.

Risks & Challenges

This isn't my first time producing a deck. And the design and proofing process are complete. The booklet and "Game of Hope" spread cloth are being finalized now and are set to be ready before the campaign ends. The proof copy of Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand is a colorful reminder of my initial goal to create a Lenormand deck suitable to use with my own clients! But this is also the largest campaign I have run to-date. So here's what I'm doing to help ensure that I've got my end of the deal covered:

  • I'm keeping the campaign simple. My goal and focus is to be able to produce the first edition in a cost-effective number so that it may be sold in stores.
  • I'm researching my best options for packaging and shipping as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible to make sure that delivery doesn't get hung up on my end! Little Lulu has no intention of being Late Lulu.
  • I've been researching and following project campaigns by fellow card-designers and learning from their successes and challenges. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Little Lulu's Lucky Lenormand can use your support in any capacity! With your help and a little luck, Little Lulu will find her way to those who could use her insight.

  • Please share the campaign with friends and family you think would enjoy it!
  • Indiegogo has lots of handy-dandy share tools to help spread the word about this campaign.
  • Give the project a like and a shout out! I truly appreciate 

I am so grateful for all of the love and support I've already received for this project. I hope you will join me and follow-along on Little Lulu's journey! (Yes. Yes, I did check the thesaurus to see if there was a suitable "L" synonym for journey...)

story:
Short Summary

I am a dedicated tabletop gamer and long time hobbyist who generally finds as much enjoyment in creating fun things as I do playing games. With the accessibility of 3D printers growing daily there has never been a better time to be a tabletop gamer and it is with that thought in mind that I started developing my own range of printable models. I'm a fan of both fantasy and sci-fi games but I decided to start here as I intend to use these tiles myself to create a vault for the Fallout miniatures game and as part of my Alien vs Predator games.

This campaign will contain every tile needed to create awesome looking vaults or spaceships plus some highly detailed scatter terrain to populate your rooms and corridors. To start with there are a total of 29 unique tiles ranging from basic walls and corridors to stairs, doors and balcony pieces.  A further 19 pieces of scatter terrain are currently completed including unique pieces such as a portal (stargate anybody?) and a selection of modular console units. All of the files are tested on a cheap stock Anet A8 printer and are designed to be fully support-less for ultimate ease of printing 

Throughout the campaign I will continue to create more tiles and tile variants to expand upon the possibilities of the space-lock system as well as creating more interesting scatter. 

As this is my first project I am keeping the project goal low with the aim of developing an ever expanding range of 3D printable products. All funding raised will go towards the development of new models as well as test printing any prototypes prior to release. During the funding period  I will continue to create and test print new tiles and scatter which will all be included as free extras for all supporters, I will also take any requests you have into consideration so that we can work together to create better looking games that people really do want to play.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Space-lock tiles are a system of interlocking modular tiles that dont require any small clips or fragile connectors to stay locked in place. The system supports multi level buildings and can be used to create solid tables without any voids or as a series of winding tunnels and rooms for all manner of modern and science fiction games. The tiles feature an integrated 1 inch square sytem without impacting the quality of the design and have been made to work equally well with both 28mm and 32mm scale miniatures although they can be scaled up or down as desired (I bet they look great printed on a photon at 25% scale now i think about it). So far all of the listed tiles and scatter terrain have been finished guarateeing each supporter will receive a great selection of files for creating truly epic scenery.  

To keep things simple there will be only 3 perks consisting of a early bird personal use perk, a standard personal use perk and a commercial use perk which will allow people to sell their prints for a one off licence fee for as long as they wish which will be ideal for startup printing businesses and larger print companies alike. All 3 perks will include everything that is currently finished plus any new models that are made during the campaign ensuring you get the best possible deal.

Below are some pictures of the finished pieces as well as a list of everything currently available.

Current tiles consist of:

  • Balcony corner A
  • Balcony corner B (inverted)
  • Balcony straight 
  • Balcony corner adapter
  • Balcony floor tile surround (U shape piece)
  • Ramp straight piece 
  • Ramp corner piece
  • Floor with corner post on 1 corner
  • Floor with corner post on 2 adjacent corners
  • Floor with corner post on 2 diagonal corners
  • Floor with corner post on 3 corners
  • Floor with corner post on 4 corner (crossroad tile)
  • Wall with corner post left
  • Wall with corner post right
  • Wall with 2 corner posts (T-junction)
  • Corridor corner
  • Corridor straight 
  • Corridor with door/ airlock
  • Room corner
  • Room wall
  • Room wall with door
  • Dead end 
  • Dead end with ladders
  • Floor A
  • Floor B
  • Floor C
  • Floor D
  • Steps tile
  • Door insert 

Current scatter terrain consist of:

  • Barrel A
  • Barrel B
  • Corner console A
  • Double console A
  • Double console B
  • Single console A
  • Stacked console A
  • Cryopod horizontal A
  • Cryopod standing B
  • Large desk
  • Med bay table
  • Portal
  • Riot shield large
  • Riot shield small
  • Satellite receiver large 
  • Satellite receiver small
  • Storage/ shipping container (Hex)
  • Table A
  • Table B

The following pictures are of the finished tiles and scatter as well as renders of various pieces I have yet to print. All of the tiles are printed with a 0.3 layer height using a 0.4 nozzle on a stock anet A8, all scatter is printed on the same machine using a 0.2 layer height. All of the models have been designed to be printed without supports although the 2 doors and portal has some sagging at the very top of the opening if bridging isn't turned on in the slicer. GW models are included for scale.

One thing to note is that all of the tiles are in their clean and undamaged states although I am currently working on some damaged and alien versions to add more variety which I hope to include in this campaign. 

 

 

I will continue to update this section with more pictures of the finished prints throughout the funding period as well as an in depth look at each tile and piece of scatter terrain. 

 

Licence Options

 

Space lock terrain will be available with two different licences covering both personal and commercial use.

The personal use licence is ideal if you want to print the files for your own use. This means the files or finished prints can not be profited from in any way including but not limited to selling painted or raw prints, printing the files as part of a service or editing the files or prints in any way.

The commercial licence is aimed at people that wish to sell their epic printed terrain. This does not allow you to profit from or distribute the files, either original or edited versions including modified "remixed" versions without prior written permission from myself. With this licence you can print and sell any of the tiles or scatter terrain released during this campaign (including any models released as part of the campaign which are completed after the funding date). The cost of the licence during this campaign is exclusive to this campaign and is a single fee granting you lifetime rights to profit from the printing of all files presented in this campaign. 

 

If you have any questions regarding the licences please contact me and I will be happy to help.

 

The Impact

 

This project will hopefully be the first of many if all goes well with the end goal of creating a great range of modular terrain and scatter terrain. With your support I will be able to continue creating awesome stuff for enhancing our collective gaming experiences while enjoying doing what I love.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

There will be no risks or major challenges associated with this campaign as I have already done all of the hard work designing the files listed above. After a lot of thought I can only identify a couple of potential challenges although I believe I already have possible solutions for them should they arise.

- Firstly there is the possibility that my printer develops some sort of mechanical problem during test printing. Anybody that owns at least one printer knows that this is always a very real threat but if this does happen I am fortunate enough to have a backup printer should I need it and I am sure one or two of the project supporters would be generous enough to help out too.

- The next potential challenge is with possible delays relating to the creation of future models throughout the campaign. This is a purely theoretical challenge but if one of you suggests a design which proves difficult to create I have decided the best course of action is to move the problem model to the end of the "to do" list while I focus on any other outstanding creations. Everything available during the campaign will be uploaded to an online drive for easy access which will be added to as new models are made and test printed, this will stop any outstanding creations from having an effect on the availability of the already finished models.

If there is anything you think I may have missed I would love to hear your thoughts or any questions you might have, I am pretty confident that I have covered all angles but any and all input would be greatly appreciated no matter how minor it may seem.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

I understand that not everybody is in a situation where they may be able to contribute financially but even a simple share on social media would be greatly appreciated and it really would help, even reading this is helping out so if you've made it this far thank you!

A lot of people also don't own or have access to a 3D printer so if you know of any commercial printers who would be interested in a licence to sell space-lock terrain I would also really appreciate it if you share this campaign with them to help make these models as accessable as possible for gamers everywhere.

Anybody that owns at least one printer knows that this is always a very real threat but if this does happen I am fortunate enough to have a backup printer should I need it and I am sure one or two of the project supporters would be generous enough to help out too.
- The next potential challenge is with possible delays relating to the creation of future models throughout the campaign. This is a purely theoretical challenge but if one of you suggests a design which proves difficult to create I have decided the best course of action is to move the problem model to the end of the "to do" list while I focus on any other outstanding creations. Everything available during the campaign will be uploaded to an online drive for easy access which will be added to as new models are made and test printed, this will stop any outstanding creations from having an effect on the availability of the already finished models.
If there is anything you think I may have missed I would love to hear your thoughts or any questions you might have, I am pretty confident that I have covered all angles but any and all input would be greatly appreciated no matter how minor it may seem.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
 
I understand that not everybody is in a situation where they may be able to contribute financially but even a simple share on social media would be greatly appreciated and it really would help, even reading this is helping out so if you've made it this far thank you!
A lot of people also don't own or have access to a 3D printer so if you know of any commercial printers who would be interested in a licence to sell space-lock terrain I would also really appreciate it if you share this campaign with them to help make these models as accessable as possible for gamers everywhere.

story:
We are not the first to suggest using 100-cell chess. About 100 years ago the famous José Raúl Capablanca offered 80 and 100-cell chess, and most likely he was not the first in this either.

We just carried out some of our own research and produced the most balanced version of 100-cell chess in our humble opinion. We also modeled 2 additional figures - the general and the marshall, and did it so that for a normal chess player at first glance it was clear how these figures move.

Additionally we tested many different versions with 80, 100, 120, 121, 144 cells with different combinations of old and new figures. We tried to find a best balance between the duration of the game, the variation of moves and the ease of adaptation. As a result in our final model percent of drawn matches was less than 7% (In classical chess we have it nearly 55%). Average game duration – 84 moves. We tried to play with Fisher time settings but finally we recommend 20 min. + 10sec. per move for rapid, and 5min.+5sec. for blitz

We tried to play with Fisher time settings but finally we recommend 20 min. + 10sec. per move for rapid, and 5min.+5sec. for blitz

story:
About this campaign

 

I'm Sylvia Ritter, a digital artist from Germany. My artworks have been commissioned by festivals and record labels, musicians and book authors as well as publishers and game companies. In my free time I also create art for personal projects. You may know my Ubuntu Animals series or my ongoing series of animal-themed tarot cards. Click here for my full portfolio.

 

About "The Star" & "Temperance" Jigsaw Puzzles

 

Delivered in the coldest time of year, these jigsaw puzzles make a great way to entertain yourself with friends and family as you gather around the table. Or take some me-time and solve the puzzle by yourself, wrapped in a snug blanket and relaxing with a hot beverage by your side. 

Once solved, puzzles can be permanently secured using adhesive sheets and framed and hung on a wall like a painting, allowing you to enjoy the detailed illustrations all year round and share them with your guests.

The Star and Temperance were created for a tarot deck, which is still in ongoing development. They are uniquely suited to be used for large jigsaw puzzles, as the high degree of detail can be appreciated in every tile. 

The tiles are expertly designed and produced by a renowned German board game manufacturer, guaranteeing quality, robustness and a smooth puzzle solving experience.

The collected funds will cover processing & manufacturing costs. A small percentage also goes towards completion of the tarot deck and our game in development called NOWHERE.  

"The Star" - Details

 

Puzzle Details

  • 1000 jigsaw puzzle tiles.
  • The assembled artwork is approximately 700 x 500 mm in size.
  • 120 g Chromopaper on 1.155 g, laminated puzzle cardboard.
  • Ships in a sturdy slip lid box approximately 373 x 273 x 55 mm in size.
  • Ships with a Certificate of Authenticity.

 

 

Stretch Goal

Should the kickstarter reach €18000, all backers who bought two puzzles will additionally receive one of my Postcard Bundles, featuring four of my animal illustrations.

 

Featuring "Lucid Lynx, Hoary Hedgehog, Wakeful Wolf and Feisty Fawn"

 

Return Policy

Should there be a problem with your puzzle, you must return it within 30 days (starting date of receipt) to receive a replacement. For proper returning procedure, please follow the directions on the packing slip. Exchanges cannot be processed after 30 days past date of receipt.

 

"Temperance" as it is being solved.

 

Risks and Challenges

 

We've ordered several prototypes and puzzled each design. They will be produced in Europe, therefore there won't be any time delays due to customs. Manufacturing will take 9-10 weeks. This will be my second campaign. My first crowdfunding project "The Wakeful Hoodie" was successfully funded on Indiegogo in October 2018.

story:
Alternative Facts is fun Ad-Lib Debate Game, a mixture of Who's Line is it Anyway and real world political debates!

In Alternative Facts: The Game you have to convince your friends that you can solve real world problems with purely idiotic suggestions.

You play a grossly under-qualified Spokesperson to the White House who's been summoned to a press briefing to answer some questions from the media.

You're scared and you have no idea what you're supposed to say but WHAT'S THIS? The Commander in Chief has just handed you his personal notes on the issue just as you're facing the media...

Lie, deflect and debate or face getting fired!

110 Cards. Aprox 1 hour playtime. 3+ Players.

Main Phase:

At the beginning of each round you draw a Newsflash card and place it on the center of the table, starting with the player least qualified to work in government and going clockwise you each take turns as the White House Press Secretary blindly drawing an Alternative Fact card from the deck.

They must pitch to the other players (the media) using the notes they’ve drawn on their Alternative Facts Card by whatever means they can to support their argument.

At the end of each round all Players (The Media) must discuss and vote together on what was the least convincing argument.

The loser of that round then gets the Newsflash Card, 2 Newsflash Cards and a player is fired (When playing with 6+ Players only 1 Newsflash is enough to get a player fired).

Fired Players now cannot win but still get votes in the upcoming rounds as the media.
This continues until there are 2 players left and it moves to the End Phase of the game..

 

End Phase (2 Players left):


Once it’s down to two players it enters the Political Debate phase of the game.
A Newsflash Card is placed in between the final players, the Media now takes turns allocating new Alternative Fact Cards, switching between players changing the direction of their argument as dictated by the Alternative Fact Cards placed in front of them.
The Media must change the Newsflash card, moving onto a new topic at their discretion as long as both players have had the chance to answer the Newsflash at least once.

First player to laugh loses.

Winner should send their resume to the White House as you’re a damn good Liar!

Why did we feel the need to make this game?

In the current political climate where lying to the media using "Alternative Facts" and the active repression of science, logic, reason and compassion is the norm we felt this game helps demonstrate the absurdity of the situation.
Hopefully this game can be used to highlight the important role that the media plays in politics and reflects the problems of a government that's grossly under-qualified to lead.


To make this game happen we need to raise enough to pay for the minimum print run and actually get the game into your hands. This is the majority of what the funding will go towards, getting that first run out!

We also need to pay artists and designers to get the game looking nice and pretty!

But the job doesn't end there! Getting the game out there and in front of people takes time and money, we plan on taking this game around to conventions so people can learn about how ridiculous Alternative Facts actually is and help to bring that political discussion into a space that's usually void of Politics.

10% percent of any profits made after costs from this Crowdfund will be donated towards the ACLU and NILC.

There's other ways for you to help promote ACTUAL facts rather than Fake ones, ways you can do this include donating directly to the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU)
For almost 100 years, the ACLU has worked to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties guaranteed by the Constitution and laws of the United States.

or National Immigration Law Center (NILC)
Established in 1979, the National Immigration Law Center (NILC) is one of the leading organizations in the U.S. exclusively dedicated to defending and advancing the rights of low-income immigrants.

Other than the game itself we're also offering people the chance to put themselves in the final version of the game!

Pledge at the "Become the News" level to submit your OWN Newsflash Card to be used in the final copy of the game with your name also displayed on the card.

Newsflash Cards must be 30 words or less and respectful.
Newsflash card submissions will be discussed and finalized after the campaign has finished.

And it you want to for some reason you can own the very same hands of the President used in the video! Spray painted cheap gold and hot glue gunned onto a cheap plywood board this ugly little thing isn't likely to structurally last for very long.
Just like the real thing!

We're going to be adding Stretch Goals soon, check back for more information!

Alt-Facts is made by Game Designer Skaidris Gunsmith, owner of Gunsmith Games and creator of drinking game Suddenly Drunk which was also funded on IndieGoGo.
He also runs a Geek Nightclub in Melbourne, Australia called Beta Bar.

Artwork is by Designer Gavin Greco, Gavin is a cat-loving, queer, trans boi living in Seattle, WA. When not making art, he can be found eating pasta.
Find Gavin on Twitter Here.

story:
Short Summary

I am Norbert Dornauer, I lost my eyesight as a child, so I developed the game IQ Fun, as a game for everyone. We are based in Austria, which is in the heart of Europe. So also the game IQ-Fun was made in Austria with love from untreated 100% beech wood.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Now we need your help to get IQ Fun on the Market. Support our campaign now and get your IQ Fun game within the next weeks. Please also inform all your friends about our project.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • We already produced the Game IQ Fun in Austria from 100% beech wood, so there are no possible risks known.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please also inform all your friends about our project.

story:
Prelude - The Origins

"Watching people at each others throats in the office, at the dinner table or online, I am reminded of epic battles.  But instead of spells and pocket monsters, assailants arm themselves with powerful rhetoric and sharp insults.

I thought a game would be a fun way to have a chuckle at ourselves. However, the initial ideas were deemed to confrontational and the idea was buried.  Until....." 

3 years later,  Darylle entered the scene.  

"Controversial?  We're doing it!"

 

 Mechanics & Prototype 1 - The Cue Cards

When we first started, it was just hand-written cue cards, played entirely over Google Hangouts and Zoom. We could not meet to build or test the game for the first few months because of Covid restrictions.

 

Prototype 2 - Derek's drawings & original content concept.

Our original concept was common everyday fallacies, and examples via the mean things my wife says to me (Derek). We lightened the mood by adding funny animals.

Concept 2:  Fallacies and Wiillustration

It took weeks of scouring through reddit forums and Instagram hashtags until we finally found Will Heldt who helped us pave a new creative direction. We leaned more into the fallacies, rather than trying to push a point.

But we got too smart for our own good, and the fallacies flew over people’s heads. 

 Character Illustrations - Prototype 3, 4, 5

So we created 4 relatable characters and brought back the banter, in a silly way.

In the end, our mission was to bridge the gap between gamers and non-gamers--- bringing more people together. So we made decisions for this game to be easy to pick up for as many people as possible, and not get too lost in the flavor of the game on the first go.  (If you want more profanity or more "real" experience, the NSFW is probably for you.)

story:
Most gamers have a lot of dice, many store those dice in something. Most prefer bags, although some like the sort-ability provided by plastic...

What if there was a bag that could sort?... well, there is! You can sort dice by set or by types, or whatever you want! No more fumbling for 6d6 or 5d4... just reach into the pocket and grab some!

Plus, when it's open, there's a rolling surface in the middle. The d-Bag on top of the project is the prototype I made for my husband for Valentine's Day. Here's what the Black Pleather that I intend to mass produce would look like:


The d-Bag solves three common problems faced by gamers:
     How do you transport your dice?
     How do you organize your dice? AND...
     How do you contain your dice rolls?

Want to see our product in action? Her's an interview of me at Kublacon in 2016... our first Convention appearance!

Now, through this Project, you too can get a d-Bag at a steep Retail Discount, but that means that all orders will be fulfilled in Black Pleather (Henry Ford would be proud). If you want a fancy d-Bag imediately, those are still available at full price at www.getadbag.com (or you can get one by purchasing it here, again, with you're discount!). If we reach full funding, we'll add another type of bag. ALL BACKERS WILL BE ABLE TO CHOOSE FROM ALL BAGS AVAILABLE AT THE END OF THE PROJECT.

$0-$3,000 - Black Pleather
$3,000-$6,000 - Green Paisley Stripe (see fabric shot at bottom of page)
$6,000-$9,000 - d's in SPaaaaCE (see fabric shot at bottom of page) 
$9,000-$12,000 - ???? (What's your favorite d-Bag fabric? Feel free to let us know in the Comments section!

Here's some back story:  In the process of fulfilling the 300+ original d-Bag rewards, I set up a relationship with a local Micro-Mass Manufacturer (MMM). This means that as I grow d-Bags will be made 100% in Oakland, CA or Pittsburgh, PA.

Don't get me wrong, I'll still be making some more unique d-Bags myself, but working with the MMM and the tools that they have access to means that I can start making them at a scale that I could never achieve personally.

In case you haven't noticed, it's about to be Christmas. So, my question for you is, who wants a d-Bag???

Here's some feedback from the first Kickstarter:

"My bag arrived today! It's gorgeous and works beautifully! I will no longer confuse my tea-box with my dice box. Nor will I ever not have enough dice at a game. :D" - ketherian

"Got my bag today. Love it! Even better than I was expecting - so glad I backed this on an impulse." - Nicola McBlane

"Received my bag and it is better than I expected. Please keep us posted on future store and sales as I will be considering these for future gifts-some for others, some for me :)" - SM Moore

"It is gorgeous! So happy with this! It holds a crap ton of dice too! Each side pocket easily holds 12x 16mm d6s (could likely hold 18 or 20) or 36x 12mm d6s. The main compartment will hold an additional 80+ 12mm d6s, and when closed it feels about 80% full and dice stay in their pockets. Amazeballs! Super happy backer here!" - Danny R

"I just received my bags today. Holy quality batman. These things are gorgeous. Thank you so much, I will cherish these." - Steven Burge

"I got my bag yesterday and it's SOOOOOOO awesome. I can't wait to show it off on D&D night!" - phoenixphire24

"Got my dice bag last week and I'm loving it!" - Elizabeth Horsebane

"Bag arrived today and it looks awesome, a majority of my dice fit inside." - Daisy Ramirez

Are you an original backer of the d-Bag? Have people envied it? Have they wondered how they could buy their own?

Are you a local game store owner that might want to carry the d-Bags? Stores that carry my d-Bags order more! I just fulfilled a 30 bag order from ONE of our local game stores.

But here is the thing, distributors, they want at least 60% off the retail price, and I need to pay them storage fees and I still need to do all the marketing. Even if I sell direct to stores they want at least 50% off. In order to do that, I need to increase the scale that I'm making the d-Bags, and that's where this project comes in!

If a store wants to stock some of my mass produced d-Bags, send them my way!

I'm really hoping that you'll help me make this a reality!

PS- Because Kickstarter is now including postage in "funds raised" and because of the expense of international postage, I'm not including international shipping as an option here. If you want d-Bags shipped internationally, please contact me at:  thenewdbag@gmail.com

Risks and challenges

Since I'm not asking for the full amount to cover the project there might be a chance, I can't pay for the 500 bag break point. If that is the case, I will pay the higher price per bag and just make the number ordered.

What about the turnaround time? Having worked and been talking with my MMM I know that they can turnaround 100 bags per week, without a problem, and they say they can do all 500 in 2. but I have 5 weeks built in just in case.

How do you know they will sell in stores? I've started working with my local retail stores, and they have all sold the bags successfully. As I'm writing this, one store just ordered 50!

I've also sold directly to consumers at conventions. I generally sell one d-Bag for every 10 people who attend the convention!

What if the Fabric store doesn't get the fabric? This is unlikely to happen, as I have been in talks with them and on my world they will order and hold the fabric for me. If I can't afford it all they will put it out to sell.

Here are the fabrics for the stretch goals:

 

^^^ Green Paisley Stripe                       ^^^ d's in Spaaaace

It holds a crap ton of dice too! Each side pocket easily holds 12x 16mm d6s (could likely hold 18 or 20) or 36x 12mm d6s. The main compartment will hold an additional 80+ 12mm d6s, and when closed it feels about 80% full and dice stay in their pockets. Amazeballs! Super happy backer here!" - Danny R"I just received my bags today. Holy quality batman. These things are gorgeous. Thank you so much, I will cherish these." - Steven Burge"I got my bag yesterday and it's SOOOOOOO awesome. I can't wait to show it off on D&D night!" - phoenixphire24"Got my dice bag last week and I'm loving it!" - Elizabeth Horsebane"Bag arrived today and it looks awesome, a majority of my dice fit inside." - Daisy RamirezAre you an original backer of the d-Bag? Have people envied it? Have they wondered how they could buy their own?Are you a local game store owner that might want to carry the d-Bags? Stores that carry my d-Bags order more! I just fulfilled a 30 bag order from ONE of our local game stores.But here is the thing, distributors, they want at least 60% off the retail price, and I need to pay them storage fees and I still need to do all the marketing. Even if I sell direct to stores they want at least 50% off. In order to do that, I need to increase the scale that I'm making the d-Bags, and that's where this project comes in!If a store wants to stock some of my mass produced d-Bags, send them my way!I'm really hoping that you'll help me make this a reality!PS- Because Kickstarter is now including postage in "funds raised" and because of the expense of international postage, I'm not including international shipping as an option here. If you want d-Bags shipped internationally, please contact me at:  thenewdbag@gmail.comRisks and challengesSince I'm not asking for the full amount to cover the project there might be a chance, I can't pay for the 500 bag break point. If that is the case, I will pay the higher price per bag and just make the number ordered.What about the turnaround time? Having worked and been talking with my MMM I know that they can turnaround 100 bags per week, without a problem, and they say they can do all 500 in 2. but I have 5 weeks built in just in case.How do you know they will sell in stores? I've started working with my local retail stores, and they have all sold the bags successfully. As I'm writing this, one store just ordered 50!I've also sold directly to consumers at conventions. I generally sell one d-Bag for every 10 people who attend the convention!What if the Fabric store doesn't get the fabric? This is unlikely to happen, as I have been in talks with them and on my world they will order and hold the fabric for me. If I can't afford it all they will put it out to sell.Here are the fabrics for the stretch goals:  ^^^ Green Paisley Stripe                       ^^^ d's in Spaaaace

story:
Prior to launching GMC Games, my business partner and I diligently worked on the concept and design of the release of GMC Games, flagship board game GameDay Football®. We have spent countless hours laying out all of the elements and pieces that will make this football game exhilarating, educational, fun, and highly interactive.

Fall and football can be overwhelming for people that don't fully grasp gridiron football yet find themselves at a multitude of football events and parties. Our friends and family took-part in some friendly competitive mock play and found themselves totally engaged in game play.  Being able to play GameDay Football® board game with and among football fans brings back classic face to face interaction- something we don't see as often with the advent of solitary electronic video games. 

Join us now, right at the very start of this magical journey and help us reach the End Zone! Your contribution will help us upgrade game pieces and create new and challenging plays on and off the football field. 

Gameday Football® “The ultimate football ownership game” (GDF) tailored after American Football, combines the fun and fanfare that governs the sport. Gamers become the player, own multiple teams, build multiple stadiums and celebrate like the ultimate fan. In playing GDF a player will experience the nuances that come with the game, flags will be thrown, violations will be given, endorsements will be earned, and rules will be pushed to the limits by your opponent’s eager, to get your player ejected and sent to the locker room. 

While playing GameDay Football® you get to experience first-hand what it’s like to own a team and play on the gridiron. Gamers roll the dice, acquire a state and let the games begin! Each owner that buys a state can, erect a field, buy and develop a stadium and increase the stadiums value by adding on concessions, parking, luxury boxes, and 5-star restaurants all in the form of individual flags. 

GameDay Football® becomes even more exciting when a gamer gets a player on the field. This game of strategy has no alliances- the winning goal is to score 21 points via touchdowns and have the most revenue. With each roll of the dice, GDF is filled with many twists and turns that could either elevate your game or leave you in turmoil. Whether it’s landing on the spinning wheel, picking up the money from the league fines and penalty fee’s when landing on the tailgate box, or facing the fate of the draw when pulling from one of the four game cards placed around the board. Another benefit while playing GameDay Football® is that when a player rolls the dice and it lands on two “G’s” representing the GameDay Football® logo, the player advances around the field to the start and gets to roll the red GDF bonus dice. Depending on what the player rolls, that player will get that value plus $1000 dollars.

GameDay Football® gameplay will raise your football IQ, bring out your competitive nature and give you the thrill of victory.

Game designed for 2 to 5 players ages 13 and over.  

Aside from our backers getting game day football perks we are excited to share our board game and passionate about giving our backers awesome game day tips throughout football season via our blog.  

Please join our supporters! Back GameDay Football game and together, let’s make football season more enjoyable. 

Gameday Football® “The ultimate football ownership game” (GDF) tailored after American Football, combines the fun and fanfare that governs the sport. Gamers become the player, own multiple teams, build multiple stadiums and celebrate like the ultimate fan. In playing GDF a player will experience the nuances that come with the game, flags will be thrown, violations will be given, endorsements will be earned, and rules will be pushed to the limits by your opponent’s eager, to get your player ejected and sent to the locker room.

While playing GameDay Football® you get to experience first-hand what it’s like to own a team and play on the gridiron. Gamers roll the dice, acquire a state and let the games begin! Each owner that buys a state can, erect a field, buy and develop a stadium and increase the stadiums value by adding on concessions, parking, luxury boxes, and 5-star restaurants all in the form of individual flags. 

GameDay Football® becomes even more exciting when a gamer gets a player on the field. This game of strategy has no alliances- the winning goal is to score 21 points via touchdowns and have the most revenue. With each roll of the dice, GDF is filled with many twists and turns that could either elevate your game or leave you in turmoil. Whether it’s landing on the spinning wheel, picking up the money from the league fines and penalty fee’s when landing on the tailgate box, or facing the fate of the draw when pulling from one of the four game cards placed around the board. Another benefit while playing GameDay Football® is that when a player rolls the dice and it lands on two “G’s” representing the GameDay Football® logo, the player advances around the field to the start and gets to roll the red GDF bonus dice. Depending on what the player rolls, that player will get that value plus $1000 dollars.

GameDay Football® gameplay will raise your football IQ, bring out your competitive nature and give you the thrill of victory.

Are you prepared to out think your opponent and claim total gridiron dominance on and off the field? Find out: GameDay Football® board game has arrived!

Are you ready for some football! We want to help you make Game Day more enjoyable! Aside from having a great game to play at your next football event, party or tailgate all backers can benefit by receiving other game day tips throughout the regular football season by visiting our blog. 

Let us help you get ready for football season with these exciting perks!

FEATURED Preseason Pass   
Admission Ticket 
Game Announcer
GDF Playbook 
GDF Press Pass
Season Ticket Holder 
GDF Endorsement Deal 
GDF Tailgate Crew
GameDay Football Commissioner 
GDF Global Bowl Champion 

We are based in the United States and will ship from Los Angeles, California.

Playing GameDay Football® is an experience not only for the owners and players on the field but most important for the spectator and football fans. By backing GameDay Football® you will help us: 

  • Foster camaraderie between family and friends 
  • Educate football novice on some of the basic fundamentals of Gridiron football
  • Challenge football enthusiast and bring out their competitive nature
  • Provide a fun game to partake in prior to any football event, party or tailgate

As the creators of GameDay Football® the quality of the game’s production is of the utmost importance to us. We worked diligently with top game designers and manufactures and ordered countess prototypes to deliver a final game that meets a high-quality standard. Because of our initial efforts, we are minimizing quality control issues.  

We are optimistic and plan on delivering all copies of GameDay football® one month prior to football season, which begins in the fall.

Our company is based in the United States. To our international customers please be aware that some customs fees may apply and we will calculate shipping fee at the time your perk is shipped.

As we get closer to our due date we will keep all supports and the public informed of the progress, any modifications (beyond our control) that need to be made and support delivery status.

We are confident with Indiegogo "Flexible" campaign option we can guarantee everyone who contributes will get their pledged perks. Our game manufactures are on standby. We just need you help to make it happen! 

Your help is important to us, here is what you can do if you want to help:

  • Share this campaign page on your social networks.
  • Spread the word to all your friends and family who might like the game.

We value your opinion and we are so grateful that you checked out our up and coming GameDay Football® board game.

Thank you!

the models come unpainted but with a base

Napoleonica and us the help that we need so much so that other projects get ahead.

We ship worldwide

story:
Short Summary

Hello I’m Felix Joy and I’m proud to present my first solo playing cards - The Split. This Deck is an encapsulated form of minimal, typographic and graphic design styles.

The designing has been done through testing and tweaking to find the best style.

A single typeface and minimal design ensures cards areas to read and gives a unique twist to traditional style.

 

** Card Colors may differ slightly because of different light settings**

 

Design

The Split Deck truly represents its name with a split design as you can see in the card. I wanted the design to be minimal and restrictive, so complex patterns have not been included in this series, but a bold and simple approach have instead been introduced.

I have created a test deck and printed to ensure meticulous testing of how the card plays, holds, the way your eyes are drawn to each element and the hierarchy of each.

As not only a designer, but also a playing card fan, I wanted to create a series of playing card decks that stands out from the others in my collection, and share with you all a new experience of card playing.

Using a modern approach to design, the goal was to develop a look that is totally new and fresh. The Split Playing Cards are luxury for the modern cardician.

Colors 

I have used the standard playing colors, i.e., Red and Black for this edition as it is the most basic colours for playing cards. In future I will be introducing more vibrant and playful colours to the collection.

Faces

The faces, inspired by typographic and minimalisitc approach, look completely clean but with same split branding which is black and red splits respectively.

Quality & Handling

After we established the look, we focused on the feel. The true mark of a card is how it handles. The Split Deck will be printed by the United States Playing Card Company on the highest quality card stock available. The deck will be with the legendary Air Cushion Finish to provide for the smoothest spread, fans, and shuffles. 

Pricing

This is a fixed funding campaign, meaning if you purchase any of our perks and we don't reach our goal of $10,000 within 35 days - you will get your money back!

Risks & Challenges

The only challenge is getting enough funding to get the decks printed. The USPCC need a minimum order to print your design which need huge amount of money. That is the reason we are asking for support.

Other than that printing delays may occur, but I'll work hard to get things resolved. Cards will be sent as soon as the production is complete. i.e ., Dec 2017 (hopefully).

story:
In my almost 30 years working with different forms of divination, I became obsessed with "Throwing the Bones" and discovered this method could be done using charms! I put together this kit to use in my readings for clients and now I want to share it with the world! I love divination, from tarot to pendulums to charm casting, you name it I have a love for it. I also have a love for teaching! I hope that this kit will expand the divination world and help others like me to expand their practice. 

This charm collection is based on the Lenormand cards, Tarot cards, and life in general. I offer my own interpretations of all 50 charms but I think it’s important to devise your own method of interpreting each charm in your set, make them your own! Feel free to add charms and subtract charms, this kit is designed to make you feel comfortable using them, there is no need to use all of the charms I provide. These Divination Charms can be used alone or in combination with other divination tools, my favorite way to use these is to combine them with my tarot cards to bring more depth to my readings. You will receive 50 charms in a drawstring bag and an explanation booklet all neatly tucked into a pocket-sized hinged lid tin for your carrying convenience.

story:
Ultimate Mindfulness & Growth Mindset Activity Cards

 

Empower children for life by spending just 5 minutes a day with activity cards designed by a best-selling mindfulness teacher.

Great for kids ages 5-99, those with special needs - and adults, too! 

Activities include child- and classroom-friendly self-regulation, sensory awareness, focusing, gratitude, kindness, growth mindset and relaxation activities, and so much more.

Easy to teach - easy to learn

  • Increase participation with talking points, quizzes and easy-to-do activities
  • Make practice easy with short micro-activities
  • Keep practice fresh with 120 mini-lessons and micro-activities 
  • Make teaching easy with close to zero prep time and lots of inspiration
  • Class-room friendly with secular and SEL based content

 

Find out more at Blissful Kids.

 

 

Support Your Children with Soothing, Simple Mindfulness and Growth Mindset Practices

 

Each card teaches your children a new short lesson, a “micro-activity”, breaking down big, complicated ideas into bite-sized pieces that children can handle and enjoy. 

The cards are color-coded for topics you want your children to learn.

Each topic, once learned, equips your children with a new essential life skill.

These life skills will be acquired through a combination of discussion and practice.

     

     

    Exceptionally Easy to Use

     

    You simply pick a card and read it out loud. 

    Mindfulness can be practiced in just a minute or two. Share the cards in therapy sessions, classrooms and at home. Create longer lessons easily by picking multiple cards.

    Virtual teachers have a handy tool to keep their students engaged and learning! The activities are dynamic and encourage participation.

       

         

        Essential Topics

         

        Gift children skills that last a lifetime:

        • develop strategies to manage emotions
        • learn focusing skills
        • learn self-kindness
        • learn self-belief
        • discover ways to experience more joy
        • build resilience to live happier and healthier lives

         

        Activity topics include the following:

        • Self-regulation and attention skills
        • Gratitude, joy, and happiness
        • Kindness and social emotional skills
        • Growth mindset skills

         

        You can immediately begin teaching your children all these amazing life skills. Practicing mindfulness, learning social emotional skills, and nurturing a growth mindset doesn’t get any easier.

           

          Easy As 1-2-3!

           

           

          Our Team

           

          Hi! My name is Chris Bergstrom, husband to Hanna and father to Anton. I’m a certified mindfulness teacher and a two-time best-selling author on mindfulness.

          My lovely wife, Hanna Bergstrom, is a professional illustrator and photographer. It was Hanna and my son who inspired me to launch the IndieGogo campaign.

          Together, our family would like to help parents, educators, and schools make practicing mindfulness at home or in (virtual) classrooms a lovely bonding experience with children.

           

          Our Story

           

          Hanna and I have been teaching mindfulness to our son, Anton, for 7+ years. I have designed hundreds of child-friendly activities and now we’ve tried more than 200 mindfulness activities! 

          It’s been amazing to see our little boy use mindfulness skills on the spot to overcome anxiety, deal with pain, calm down when nervous, overcome fear, focus on a difficult task to perform better, feel better when mommy was away, and fall asleep when it was tough to do. 

          Then came our lightbulb moment! 

          We were so happy with how Anton was learning and enjoying our mindfulness and growth mindset lessons that we were inspired to pursue our ultimate dream: 

          To teach mindfulness and growth mindset skills to children worldwide.

          The current pandemic is certainly an opportunity to begin!

          To date, we've helped make mindfulness easy for thousands of educators, parents and children through our blog, books and courses.

          Now, we've applied all we've learned to these cards to help you empower your children.

           

          The Impact

           

          Not only will this be a new, engaging way to learn mindfulness, but you'll also be a part of real-world change, teaching children empowering life skills.

          When we reach our goal, you'll have helped thousands of children learn empowering life skills. 

          I truly believe that children with these skills can build a better future for the whole planet.

          Helping children feel and do better is like planting seeds that can change the course of our shared tomorrow.

           

          Start Nurturing Amazing Life Skills

           

           

           

          How You Can Help

           

          Producing the decks of cards is straightforward. The designs of the cards are ready and all writing has been completed. My wife has designed the cute card covers… We’re all set!

          We have all 120 cards ready, and I have a few prototypes at home.

          The only aspect of the project that needs funding is printing a large volume of decks to be able to lower the price per deck for you.

          The manufacturer keeps emailing me every week, asking if we’re ready to print.

          We are… almost!

          So, please support our campaign now by pre-ordering your own deck of empowering mindfulness and growth mindset cards.

           

          Exclusive Campaign Discount

           

          Our IndieGogo backers will receive an exclusive campaign discount and bonuses as a thank you for helping us push out our first printed batch. 

          We value your role as founding backers, and you will always be remembered and cherished.

          With your help, we’ll be able to get the decks printed to make Ultimate Mindfulness and Growth Mindset Cards a reality for thousands of children!

           

          Risks & Challenges

          • Prototypes have been printed and tested as you can see in the video. 
          • Printing and shipping have been secured by reliable companies.  
          • We are mindful of the environment and human rights. Our printing partner is FSC and BSCI certified.
          • We expect to begin printing the cards by the end of the campaign. 
          • We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product on time. However, we are living in a new era where COVID-19 has affected shipping times both within the U.S. and internationally, causing shipping delays. Unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to working day and night to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent with you. 
          • We will provide you with a tracking number so you can track your package in transit. 
          • Shipping does not cover import taxes and duties. So, you are responsible for paying the customs charge on your shipment if you live outside the U.S.  
          • We are just starting this business, so we currently do not have a warehouse for returns and cannot accept return items. However, we are looking into warehousing options.  
          • Mindfulness is well researched and used in hundreds of classrooms but in all fairness we cannot guarantee specific results and health outcomes. 
          • If our campaign does not meet its goal, you will automatically receive a refund within 5 business days ( per Indiegogo refund policy ).
          • You can ask for a refund from your Indiegogo account page before you confirm shipping details until after the END of the campaign.

           

          Our Guarantee

          Remember that you are covered by our guarantee.

          You can ask for a refund from your Indiegogo account page before you confirm shipping details until after the END of the campaign.

          This way there will be no surprise costs for you and you will be able to refund your pre-order should you decide to do so.

          AND if the campaign doesn’t get funded all the way then you will be refunded automatically by Indiegogo.

           

          Other Ways You Can Help

           

          Some people won’t be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help share the important message about children's mindfulness:

          • Spread the word and make some noise about our campaign across social media and by word-of-mouth.
          • Use the IndieGogo share tools to share info about the campaign with your family & friends!
          • Tell your friends on Facebook or email them about it.

           

          Thank You For Being A Part Of Our Global Mindful Family! 

           

          Thank you so much for your interest and support! May your children learn amazing, empowering life skills and may you all be healthy and happy.

           

          With love and gratitude,

          Chris, Hanna, and Anton
story_txt:
Ultimate Mindfulness & Growth Mindset Activity Cards Empower children for life by spending just 5 minutes a day with activity cards designed by a best-selling mindfulness teacher.Great for kids ages 5-99, those with special needs - and adults, too! Activities include child- and classroom-friendly self-regulation, sensory awareness, focusing, gratitude, kindness, growth mindset and relaxation activities, and so much more.Easy to teach - easy to learn

Increase participation with talking points, quizzes and easy-to-do activities

Make practice easy with short micro-activities

Keep practice fresh with 120 mini-lessons and micro-activities 

Make teaching easy with close to zero prep time and lots of inspiration

Class-room friendly with secular and SEL based content
 Find out more at Blissful Kids.  Support Your Children with Soothing, Simple Mindfulness and Growth Mindset Practices Each card teaches your children a new short lesson, a “micro-activity”, breaking down big, complicated ideas into bite-sized pieces that children can handle and enjoy. The cards are color-coded for topics you want your children to learn.Each topic, once learned, equips your children with a new essential life skill.These life skills will be acquired through a combination of discussion and practice.  Exceptionally Easy to Use You simply pick a card and read it out loud. Mindfulness can be practiced in just a minute or two. Share the cards in therapy sessions, classrooms and at home. Create longer lessons easily by picking multiple cards.Virtual teachers have a handy tool to keep their students engaged and learning! The activities are dynamic and encourage participation.  Essential Topics Gift children skills that last a lifetime:
develop strategies to manage emotions
learn focusing skills
learn self-kindness
learn self-belief
discover ways to experience more joy
build resilience to live happier and healthier lives
 Activity topics include the following:
Self-regulation and attention skills
Gratitude, joy, and happiness
Kindness and social emotional skills
Growth mindset skills
 You can immediately begin teaching your children all these amazing life skills. Practicing mindfulness, learning social emotional skills, and nurturing a growth mindset doesn’t get any easier. Easy As 1-2-3!  Our Team Hi! My name is Chris Bergstrom, husband to Hanna and father to Anton. I’m a certified mindfulness teacher and a two-time best-selling author on mindfulness.My lovely wife, Hanna Bergstrom, is a professional illustrator and photographer. It was Hanna and my son who inspired me to launch the IndieGogo campaign.Together, our family would like to help parents, educators, and schools make practicing mindfulness at home or in (virtual) classrooms a lovely bonding experience with children. Our Story Hanna and I have been teaching mindfulness to our son, Anton, for 7+ years. I have designed hundreds of child-friendly activities and now we’ve tried more than 200 mindfulness activities! It’s been amazing to see our little boy use mindfulness skills on the spot to overcome anxiety, deal with pain, calm down when nervous, overcome fear, focus on a difficult task to perform better, feel better when mommy was away, and fall asleep when it was tough to do. Then came our lightbulb moment! We were so happy with how Anton was learning and enjoying our mindfulness and growth mindset lessons that we were inspired to pursue our ultimate dream: To teach mindfulness and growth mindset skills to children worldwide.The current pandemic is certainly an opportunity to begin!To date, we've helped make mindfulness easy for thousands of educators, parents and children through our blog, books and courses.Now, we've applied all we've learned to these cards to help you empower your children. The Impact Not only will this be a new, engaging way to learn mindfulness, but you'll also be a part of real-world change, teaching children empowering life skills.When we reach our goal, you'll have helped thousands of children learn empowering life skills. I truly believe that children with these skills can build a better future for the whole planet.Helping children feel and do better is like planting seeds that can change the course of our shared tomorrow. Start Nurturing Amazing Life Skills   How You Can Help Producing the decks of cards is straightforward. The designs of the cards are ready and all writing has been completed. My wife has designed the cute card covers… We’re all set!We have all 120 cards ready, and I have a few prototypes at home.The only aspect of the project that needs funding is printing a large volume of decks to be able to lower the price per deck for you.The manufacturer keeps emailing me every week, asking if we’re ready to print.We are… almost!So, please support our campaign now by pre-ordering your own deck of empowering mindfulness and growth mindset cards. Exclusive Campaign Discount Our IndieGogo backers will receive an exclusive campaign discount and bonuses as a thank you for helping us push out our first printed batch. We value your role as founding backers, and you will always be remembered and cherished.With your help, we’ll be able to get the decks printed to make Ultimate Mindfulness and Growth Mindset Cards a reality for thousands of children! Risks & Challenges
Prototypes have been printed and tested as you can see in the video. 
Printing and shipping have been secured by reliable companies.  
We are mindful of the environment and human rights. Our printing partner is FSC and BSCI certified.
We expect to begin printing the cards by the end of the campaign. 
We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product on time. However, we are living in a new era where COVID-19 has affected shipping times both within the U.S. and internationally, causing shipping delays. Unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to working day and night to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent with you. 
We will provide you with a tracking number so you can track your package in transit. 
Shipping does not cover import taxes and duties. So, you are responsible for paying the customs charge on your shipment if you live outside the U.S.  
We are just starting this business, so we currently do not have a warehouse for returns and cannot accept return items. However, we are looking into warehousing options.  
Mindfulness is well researched and used in hundreds of classrooms but in all fairness we cannot guarantee specific results and health outcomes. 
If our campaign does not meet its goal, you will automatically receive a refund within 5 business days ( per Indiegogo refund policy ).
You can ask for a refund from your Indiegogo account page before you confirm shipping details until after the END of the campaign.

Spread the word and make some noise about our campaign across social media and by word-of-mouth.
Use the IndieGogo share tools to share info about the campaign with your family & friends!

Tell your friends on Facebook or email them about it.
 Thank You For Being A Part Of Our Global Mindful Family!  Thank you so much for your interest and support! May your children learn amazing, empowering life skills and may you all be healthy and happy. With love and gratitude,Chris, Hanna, and Anton

story:
My name is Cory, I work in central alberta in oil and gas industry.  I like my job, but I love playing tabletop RPG’s.  I’ve been playing for a few years now and enjoy writing adventure and campaigns.  Im even working on a setting book right now for Savage Worlds.

This campaign is about raising the funds to put together some monthly crates that will be useful and fun for you and your gaming group. 

By supporting us you will help launch a new quality product that gamers will love.

 

Funding

We need to raise about $2100.  This will pay for the perks and give us a good push in the right direction.

Risks & Challenges

Risks for this project is time.  I'm positive we can deliver this on time but obsticles may rear thier head later on.

 

Ways you can help

Other than contributing by purchasing one of our packages, the best way you can help this succeed is to share it on social media and help get the word out.

Join our mailing list for the latest news on OldCowboyGames.com

story:
Gustave Moreau

These playing cards are inspired by, and feature the artwork of, the French painter Gustave Moreau. He produced great works of art throughout the 1800's and believed that he allowed divine vision to speak through his brush. His artwork is symbolic, macabre, and absolutely impressive.

Key Information

  • Two editions: Standard and Gilded
  • Card backs and tucks feature gold cold foil
  • Card faces feature gold metallic ink
  • Tuck will use premium 330gsm card stock with embossing
  • The deck will be printed on Cartamundi's premium Slimline Paper Stock with B9 True Linen Finish
  • Fulfillment in US by Gambler's Warehouse, fulfillment in Europe by Deallez.

 

The Tuck

Foiled, embossed tuck box with a quote by Moreau down both sides

The tuck box is decked out in gold cold foil, and it features artistic embossing on the front and back. Down the sides of the box is a thought provoking quote by Gustave Moreau: 

"I have never looked for dream in reality or reality in dream. I have allowed my imagination free play, and I have not been led astray by it. I believe neither in what I touch nor what I see."

 

The Backs

The backs were designed to capture as many aspects of Moreau's art as possible: the black accents represent the dark and morose side of his artwork. The straight lines represent the dedicated path he took towards artistry, as he studied art from a young age and produced over 8,000 works of art. The gold foil represents the decadence in his style. 

 The backs of the cards, like the tuck, are covered in the cold foiled Fleur-de-lis. The Fleur-de-lis is a lasting emblem of royalty, power, honor, grandeur, faith and unity. It has been used by French royalty throughout history. The Fleur-de-lis, having strong religious ties, represents the religious symbolism in Moreau's artwork.

The borderless design of the card backs creates a unique pattern down the sides of the deck.

 

The Aces

 The faces of EVERY CARD shine with gold metallic ink.

The aces feature the following works of art:

  • Ace of Hearts: Sappho in Leucadia, 1880
  • Ace of Spades: Saint Michael Vanquishing Satan, 1882
  • Ace of Clubs: Apollo Vanquishing the Serpent Python, 1885
  • Ace of Diamonds: Voices of the Evening, 1885

 

The Jokers

The jokers feature my favorite work of art by Moreau: Angel Traveller.

 

The Courts

Spades

  • King: The Park and the Angel of Death, 1890
  • Queen: Satyrs, 1892
  • Jack: The Victorious Sphinx, 1886

Hearts

  • King: Promethee, 1868
  • Queen: Helen on the Walls of Troy, 1885
  • Jack: Arabian Poet, 1886

Clubs

  • King: Saint George, 1889-1890
  • Queen: Salome with Column, 1885-1890
  • Jack: Chimera, 1884

Diamonds

  • King: The Voices, 1867
  • Queen: The Evening, 1887
  • Jack: Dead Poet Borne by Centaur, 1890

 

The Number Cards

Custom-designed pips set these cards apart from any other deck. The design was made to match a decorative, decadent 1800's style.

 

The Half-Brick Box

Custom half-brick box with Cartes Moreau decks.

The half-brick box is an unassuming, elegant design matching that of the tuck box and card backs. Two more Gustave Moreau quotes can be found on either end of the box: 

  • "I am dominated by one thing, an irresistible, burning attraction towards the abstract"
  •  "I believe neither in what I touch nor what I see. I only believe in what I do not see, and solely what I feel." 

Add-Ons

Cartes Moreau Gilded Deck - $27 SOLD OUT

The same luxury deck taken to the next level with golden gilded edges. Limited to 500. When 500 decks are reached, all gilded deck reward tiers and addons will be unavailable!

Stretch Goals 

REACHED! $15,000 - Numbered Seals for Gilded Decks ✔✔✔

Numbered seals for the gilded decks (1-500) will be included with every gilded deck! All backers will be kept up to date with the seal design.

 

$30,000 - Numbered Seals on ALL decks + Limit Standard Edition to 2000 

Numbered seals included with every Cartes Moreau Standard Deck! No more than 2000 decks will ever be printed.

story:
Hide and Go Science is a quirky and fun strategic card game that focuses on base building and real time strategy elements. 3-5 frienemies play evil scientists bound on global conquest laying low in unique hidden Lairs.

To win, you must build and defend your Power Plants, and generate enough Energy to destroy your opponents with crazy ideas. Your Lair will become unhidden once you generate too much Energy, allowing your Lair to be attacked by your foes. Your goal is to eliminate all other players from the game by attacking and overwhelming their Lairs with Red offensive cards, while stopping them from doing the same to you.

 

 

Hide and Go Science was created by Will from Willva Films (YouTube), and play tested by his awesome pizza loving friends over a 2.5 year period. Hide and Go Science was created to be a game with more strategy than luck, without taking itself too seriously. So, now you can strategically ruin your friends day with four armed ninjas.

The game has seen many iterations and prototypes ranging from low quality, badly printed/cut paper, to professionally done high quality cards and stock. The game has been developed and is ready for publication, but printing is expensive unless you do it in bulk. Money raised by this campaign will fund the initial print run, making the game affordable to everyone involved. Efforts have been made to keep the quality high and the costs as low as possible, cost savings have been passed on to you, the backer.

Hide and Go Science was created to be the perfect strategic game for anyone who enjoys quirky games with friends.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Printing and production
I've tested many prototypes and selected the best manufacturer for quality. They are a large established printing company here in Brisbane Australia. If something went wrong on the printing side I'm confident I can speak to them and get any issues sorted out.

Shipping and distribution
Shipping has been the most challenging part of this project and has held up funding since the start of 2020. I streamlined the distribution plan to ship in bulk to major locations where backers are present, then use established fulfillment centres to break down and post individual units locally. This is by far the most cost effective way of shipping, and I've passed all the saving onto you.
I have never handled shipping and distribution before, but I'm confident things will go well since I'm using established shippers and fulfillment centres. I've simplified shipping and decided to only deliver to Australia, New Zealand, United States and Canada, (please get in contact if you're outside of these areas and we'll see what we can do).

Shipping time delays due to Covid 19
International distribution seems be slower as packages are shipped rather than flown, I've padded out the delivery time for this project to try and mitigate the impact of this on expectations. The United States and Canada will most likely see slower delivery times, whereas Australia and New Zealand will get delivered without much delay. I think communication is the best policy in these types of situations and I plan to keep backers up to date as information becomes available to me on my webpage. Every effort will be made to get your product to you as quickly as possible. The estimated delivery date takes into account the worst case scenario regarding current Covid 19 suggestions by shippers.

Currency fluctuations / shipping costs
Due to the volatile nature of the global economy I plan to purchase shipping destination currencies to lock in quoted shipping prices.

Lost items
The logistics network has reporting points so it should be relatively easy to figure out at which point an item was lost. I plan to replace or refund lost items and then seek a refund from the area that was at fault.

Additional terms and conditions
By backing Hide and Go Science, you agreed to the following additional terms and conditions:

Artwork, design and materials are subject to change.

Address communication and delivery obligations
Please enter your correct shipping details, this will minimise the time it takes to get your game to you, if your address is subject to change please contact us directly with all your details so we can work together to ensure safe delivery. If you haven't provided shipping details and they are not confirmed after a final request via email then you may be subject to increased shipping charges. Upon delivery any item risk passes to you, you will be responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable.

Email us here for any queries, or just to say hello: admin@hidegoscience.com
