story:
Using laser technology and font-pending technology we re-interpreted some classic games and made some new ones.

No need to have a phone do not need any app for it.

You can play it alone or with your frends.

You can meditate with it, but this may be an adrenaline bomb.

The content of the book was designed so that everybody can find the best site or game I did not encounter any of the people I did not like.

The games have been designed to be enjoyable on their own, but can play as many as one.

Every age group has an excitement experience and magic.

It has toys for the little ones, heavier than the big ones, complicated missions for fanatics, and heavy tournaments for party faces.

More than teamwork

The result of modern technologies and creativity is The Glow light Book. This book is a new dimension of light. Using the results of more than 6 years of development and research, we have created the Glow Light Book. The basics are laid by the greatest, like Einstein, for which special thanks go!

Everyone likes the miracle

First Secret of miracle

Paint from far away without touching

You can draw on the book's page without having to touch the page of book

Second Secret of miracle

What you draw is going to light up

bright glow glows that you have drawn so it can be seen in the dark

The basic story of the book 

With the help of the book you can look at different worlds. In different worlds, others are toys and tasks, where you have to pay attention to time where you should not make mistakes. There are some where you have to answer the question and there is a world where you can not make mistakes and make time ... 

Icons of the worlds mean

Collection of worlds

Slowly but flawlessly

More distance more difficult

Simply elegant and practical design

The book has been designed to protect the special pages from light and mechanical impacts.

Easy to carry, the inner side rings can be opened so you can easily swap the pages or expand the book.

We can put the book on the table, hang it on the wall, or set it to the side of its own side as a tent, but we can take the pages to put it on the wall so it will be the same room as a modern gallery.

 

Glow Light Book Basic Pack

The book contains a total of 1 photon reagent materials, 16 A3 photon filters. The book also includes 1 uv brush 1 laser brush and 2 laser brush heads.

 

Glow Light Book Brother Pack

The book contains a total of 2 photon reagent materials, 16 A3 photon filters. The book also includes 2 uv brush 2 laser brush and 4 laser brush heads.

 

 

Functional principle - the secret of the miracle

One side of the book is coated with photon reagent material that starts to shine with the light of a given wavelength because the light fills the surface with energy.

 

The resulting energy surplus is lost during a process with a reduced light phenomenon, which takes much longer than energy absorption in time.

 

The photon filter film of the given wavelength-resistant coating prevents the area behind it from getting energy. So these areas will not light up.

 

But it was really exciting thanks to Einstein. He laid the foundations for laser operation. With a special frequency laser, you can also transmit energy from far away to illuminate the affected area. Because of the parallel beam of the laser, only the point of impact of the laser beam gets enough energy to illuminate it. Only the part that starts touching the laser beam begins to light up.

 

High cost...

The light brush frequency range of the laser brush has been adjusted to the surface of the photoreactant surface. For perfect vision. Photon reagent and photon filter pages can be produced using special printing technology. High-quality photon filtering sites and special material for photon reagent pages also have high costs.

But the Glow Light Book is more than just a book or a game. Glow Light Book for all members of the family an experience is a common adventure and can not be compared to anyone else.

Creativity is in everyone. One of the indispensable elements of life and happiness is art, that is creative work. The Glow Light Book is the first complex system that can awaken the dormant creativity and show the way to the magic world of art and creation. This is not a video game this is not an application, It is the perfect combination of modern technology, human genius and visual creativity. 

 

Timetable

2019 In end of september the campaign is closed,

Immediately we order the printing foil sheets and special dye, we order the technical accessories uv brush and the laser brush at a fixed frequency. It is max 3 weeks.

The Glow Light Book printing is completed within 2 weeks.

So we will begin shipping the packages no later than mid-november.

2019 On the 1st of december, every package will be on the way or it is already there!

story:
-What are we going do tonight? 
- Create a tabletop game, buddy. 

My cousin is 5 years older than me. All his life he was a fan of medieval history and fantasy worlds. I had no chance to escape this passion. Books, films and of course games about brave heroes became some special part of me. Years passed, I found I had less time for playing games and the fantasy books I loved have more often been replaced by professional literature. But my passion for fictional magical worlds was always deep inside me. The dull routine of general life makes me feel mad and to escape from this feeling became the priority task. 

That’s how occasionally I found myself wishing to create a brand new game. Not just a game, but a story that can be told by the game. I told my idea to my colleague Valentine who supported me (special thanks to him for this) and suggested his own vision for the scenario of the story. 
When we found this common vision of the new project we started drawing. 

Visualization

I bought an album and some pencils (yes, just simple album with colour pencils) and started drawing. Frankly speaking I’m not the best artist. We started with the design of the Map of Orodor. The task that seemed so simple became more difficult than I could think. When the outlines of the Orodor island didn’t appear and there was some troubles with determining the scale. But some elements worked well and the story that had to be written got some really good features from areas of the map. 

Characters design happens to be an even more difficult task. If you ever tried to draw a human being, you definitely know what I’m speaking about. The fact that the last time I had been drawing was more than ten years ago did not help at all. We thought a lot about hiring some designer or just use free pieces of art from the Internet, but our final decision was to make everything by ourselves. 


The thing that really helped me was that I bought an IPad. I bought it nearly spontaneously. The tablet helped me making all the drawings in digital and learning to draw every day. I’ve been training a lot. A lot of mistakes where made and a lot of tips where learned. As a result: I started liking my own drawings (hopefully you will also like them). 

The story

The main features in the story of the Goodwood brothers was the world description with its own history and events that happened long before the trip of the main characters. We started to describe it. The task wasn’t easy at all. Some places in the story have been rewritten twice or even three times. For the finalization of our work we asked Matt to help us. As a native English speaker Matt made a real impact to our story from the literature point of view (thanks Matt! ) 


Production

From the very beginning I was trying to make the game nice looking and easy to play. It’s not very convenient to store the game in a big box, so we placed everything into an A5 format box. I was surprised by the fact that professional typography is an absolutely unknown world for me. Luckily my wife’s brother Roman helped me with the preparation of all the materials for print (thanks Roman, without you there were no chances that this project would get on paper).
Facing all the problems I realized that it’s impossible to put all the ideas I have in just one game. I wish I could make a second part of the game and continue the story, adding more interesting characters and unexpected plot pivots. 
My task is to make the game alive and to let it be loved by players all over the world. 

Overview

The game Long trip adventure “Escape from Orodor” is the first of a series games based on Throw and go system. Together with your characters you have to go a long way full of adventures and dangers. It is not an easy goal to reach the end. To survive, you will need to look for supplies and fight with creatures that inhabit this dangerous world. LTA games are perfectly compatible with each other and allow you to combine sets, creating unique combinations of heroes, artifacts, creatures and fantasy worlds. The game has no age restrictions.

Game Details

 

Heroes

LTA game is a role-playing game. The player will have to play the role of some hero or a group of heroes. Each character is depicted on a character card. It has the character’s name, the amount of his/her Strength, Agility (his/her Protection), Accuracy and Health bar. On the same card there are fields of hunger and, cell of fatigue and the cell of poisoning. 

Movement on the global map and time measurement

Any journey begins with the first step. First, drop a d6 dice and mark on the map how far your heroes have advanced. The campaign has begun.

Note that the global map is divided into segments (from one digit to another). It will be described later. The way is unpredictable. Maybe the weather is good and sunny or maybe the heroes have got into a storm. One and the same road can take different amount of time.

In order to find out how much time the move took for your heroes, roll d6 and mark on the timeline how many hours it took to pass this segment of the path. It’s up to the player to decide when the journey should be started (where will be the mark on a timeline).

The Book of the Day and the Book of the Night

When you marked on the timeline table how much time you havespent to pass your way on the map, you will find out what time it is now. Daytime lasts from 4 to 20 (let’s just call it “day”). From 20 to 4 it is the nighttime (let’s just call it “night”). During daytime you can easily hunt and find berries without fear of meeting dangerous creatures. But a beautiful light and safe forest looks quite different at night. Night is a dangerous time to walk through theswamp, because you can’t see the path. At night, you should not wander around the cemeteries and disturb the dead. The Book ofthe Day and the Book of the Night will tell you where your heroesare and what is happening to them. Look at the segment of thepath your heroes are. Open the Book of the Day (if it is the day at the moment) or the Book of the Night (if it is night) on the paragraph that relates to the segment of the path on which your heroes are located. Here you can find a description of the area and specialrules applicable to this area.

Decks of cards

In the game, there are 2 basic decks of cards (Day and Night) withcards of creatures that heroes can meet and events that can occur with the characters on their path. There is also a deck of items consisting of various things that heroes can find. In The Book of the Day and the Book of the Night you will often find an instructionto take a card from the corresponding deck. The absence of such instruction means that the terrain is more or less safe. But sometimes heroes decide to search the current terrain, for example, to find something valuable (food, supplies, treasures or artifacts). If you want to perform a research in this area, take the corresponding Day or Night card. In one turn, you can search the terrain only once.

The Deck of the Day and the Deck of the Night

In the daytime the player is relatively safe. The chance to meet a dangerous creature is much lower than at night. In the daytime it’s easier to find supplies or to hunt. In the daytime, you will often meet neutral creatures with which you can interact. At night everything changes. Creatures that get out of their shelters are more dangerous at night. You can’t find supplies at night and rarely meet peaceful creatures. Consider this when you decide to travel at night.

The Deck of items

You will find a lot of items during your adventures. Sometimes you will find new items defeating your enemies, sometimes you will find something by searching the area.

When you need to check what kind of item you’ve just found take a card from the Deck of items. Items that you found can be stacked next to you to use them later. You will find the description of theitems in the cards, but we’ve tried to make it obvious.

For example, potions allow you to restore a health or strength amount, armor increases protection, and weapons increase the chance to inflict damage to the enemy.

• Potions are disposable cards that a player can use any time (even in combat). After using the card, you must return the items back into the deck and shuffle it.

• Shield is a card that allows the player to gainadditional protection against enemy attacks. After each successful attack of the enemy, roll the D20 and compare its value with the value.

on the shield card. If the score on the dice is less than or equal to the value in the card, you have successfully repelled the attack with the shield. Shield is a reusable card, however it can’t be used with a two-handed weapon.

The Enemies

Sometimes your heroes meet enemies on their way. Cowardly goblins, fearless undead or giant trolls - they all pose a danger to the heroes. In the Deck of the Day or Deck of the Night you can find creature cards. Creature cards show what kind of creature you have met, its strength, defense, accuracy (if the creature has a ranged attack), the health bar and special rules applicable to
these creatures. Also there is the “bag” icon on the card, which shows how many items you can loot from the creature, if you defeat it (if you defeated several creatures, you take as many items as the creatures you defeated accordingly).

How to Play

 

We really need your support to bring this game to life in a way that we couldn't without your help.
Thank You for taking the time to read through this and we hope you enjoy this game.

story:
Rough-and-Tumble is a board game for your 3d printer. Rough-and-Tumble is a board game with a new and unique game mechanic: a game of chess with hexagonal boxes. You will choose between four teams: dwarves and orcs, from the first edition of the game (https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crosslance...) Chaos and high elves introduced in this game expansion. It's also possible to play Rough-and-Tumble with the only expansion, the two editions can be used separately from one another.

The game is featured by movement limitations, dependent on the occupied box. Every character has special abilities, making the game tricky and engaging!

 Here come some map preview. Also available in vectorial to be printed in any dimension.

It's not a normal board game that you buy and put on a shelf, this is a game for your 3D printer! By buying this, you will receive files to print miniatures, map and markers, directly by your own 3D printers, while cozy at home!

-if you already own a 3D printer, it's cheap and also funny, you will print unique and incredible quality models.

 -If you don't own a 3D printer, it can be an opportunity to buy one! Costs for a printer are already low and accessible to anyone. You can still use a service like: 3D hub, shapeways, or any other that the net are crowding. 

 -No shipping cost! Anywhere in the universe, you just download the files and print!

 -You can print it as many times as you want, for you and your friends.

 -You can decide any printing dimension, from miniatures to real size titan sculptures!

 - You can use these miniature for other games, as proxyes in games like ninth age or fantasy football.

for a correct miniature print in 28mm scale, it's suggested a good quality printer, with at least 100micron resolution, so that all the details of the miniature are visible and the high quality of the sculptures is adequately exalted. Don't be afraid if your printers have lower specs, you can still print them giving up to some details, or print in a bigger scale(suggested for filament print), getting over the printer problem.  

Free files Example stl files 

downloaded freely:www.crosslances.net/File/Roughandtumble/shaman%...  

The shaman ogre from the first episode of rough-and-tumble 

 some printing examples offered by Makex M-One and by Milkshake 3D

 

Our sponsors:

https://www.kudo3d.com/

http://kentstrapper.com/

https://www.lumi.industries/it/shop.html

https://www.milkshake3d.com/

http://www.ficklefiendstudio.com/

http://www.smart3d.net/

https://www.muve3d.net/

https://www.facebook.com/Eagle3DTech/

https://www.twitch.tv/monkeyswithfire

If you can not print the designs this company does it for you High quality at reasonable prices:
https://www.facebook.com/Skill3Dprinter/

Do you produce 3D printers? Do you have a printing service? Are you part of a Magazine? Do you wont to hel and see your logo on our kickstarter? Don't exitate to contact us, we only ask for a visibility exchange! Thanks a lot!

If you can't buy the game or you don't have the possibility to print with either a 3D printer or a service, but you still wish to support the board game future, you can help us donating 1€.

 

  

Pick up any of the miniatures in this kickstarter, you can tell us which model you desire at the end of the pledging period and we will send you the the file in .stl 3D format.

Choose one of the two teams and you receive the 3D files of the 6 base models. You can choose between the chaos and high elves factions.  

Chaos team

High Elf team

With the fourth pledging level, you will buy both the new teams: High Elves and Chaos! We will now show you all the characters in details:

High Elves team:

Lord Elf

Elf warrior1

Elf Warrior 2

Elf archer

Dragon Trainer

Elf Bard

Chaos Team:

Satir 1

satyr 2

Stone Golem

Chaos Warrior

Succubus

Necromancer Girl

 

buy the complete expansion with both teams: chaos and high elves , including all the bonus miniatures (infos following)

  

  

Getting this pledge, you will receive, not only Chaos and High Elves teams with their add-ons, but you will receive also the previous teams: Amazons, Undeads, Dwarves and Orcs, full, hen, king and dices add-ons included! You can find previous releases here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crosslance...

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crosslance...

And also in our stores:

https://www.cgtrader.com/3d-print-models/games-...

https://www.cgtrader.com/3d-print-models/games-...

 

All included in this once a lifetime bargain in this kickstarter!

Rough and Tumble 2

Rough and Tumble 1

 for all the buyers of the 60 euro package we decided to add another 4 rows of miniatures: 

 From left to right: 

 Giò: proxy miniature for zombiecide 

 Alice: proxy miniature for zombiecide

 Lancer girl: a character for RPG or other games 

 Queen of hearts: character sculpted on the occasion of Valentine's day

As usual for our kickstarter followers, we will give you a showcase with our classic add.ons of these two new teams!

Demon king

Elf King

draken hen (elf)

Er pollo Diablo

The classic tower, for the control point game mod.

New dice

The Wyvern!

This is an extra, not playable in the game, but still a gorgeous sculpture that we want to make available. (open in the level 2 pledge for 3€, special indiegogor price!) 

 

Demon Bust

 The Daemon Torso will be available for free only by participating in the Share&Win. 
You can find all the info HERE. We remind that participating is enough to get the reward. NOT available in the 3€ level 2 pledge.

Crosslances studios is founded by 3 artists and their commons passion for the world of games. Students at the Comics courses in Florence, made by the greebo games sculptures, they approached the world of miniatures. It has actually became a revelant studio in the world of miniatures and digital miniatures prototyping. Our products can be found in many places, we had collaborations with: Labmasu, Megalith Godslayer, Hidden Dreams, and many others  

 

 

 

https://www.facebook.com/crosslancesstudio&nbsp...  

http://www.crosslances.net/

Don't be afraid if your printers have lower specs, you can still print them giving up to some details, or print in a bigger scale(suggested for filament print), getting over the printer problem.  Free files Example stl files downloaded freely:www.crosslances.net/File/Roughandtumble/shaman%...  The shaman ogre from the first episode of rough-and-tumble  some printing examples offered by Makex M-One and by Milkshake 3D Our sponsors:https://www.kudo3d.com/http://kentstrapper.com/https://www.lumi.industries/it/shop.htmlhttps://www.milkshake3d.com/http://www.ficklefiendstudio.com/http://www.smart3d.net/https://www.muve3d.net/https://www.facebook.com/Eagle3DTech/https://www.twitch.tv/monkeyswithfireIf you can not print the designs this company does it for you High quality at reasonable prices:https://www.facebook.com/Skill3Dprinter/Do you produce 3D printers? Do you have a printing service? Are you part of a Magazine? Do you wont to hel and see your logo on our kickstarter? Don't exitate to contact us, we only ask for a visibility exchange! Thanks a lot!If you can't buy the game or you don't have the possibility to print with either a 3D printer or a service, but you still wish to support the board game future, you can help us donating 1€.   Pick up any of the miniatures in this kickstarter, you can tell us which model you desire at the end of the pledging period and we will send you the the file in .stl 3D format.Choose one of the two teams and you receive the 3D files of the 6 base models. You can choose between the chaos and high elves factions.  Chaos teamHigh Elf teamWith the fourth pledging level, you will buy both the new teams: High Elves and Chaos! We will now show you all the characters in details:High Elves team:Lord ElfElf warrior1Elf Warrior 2Elf archerDragon TrainerElf BardChaos Team:Satir 1satyr 2Stone GolemChaos WarriorSuccubusNecromancer Girl buy the complete expansion with both teams: chaos and high elves , including all the bonus miniatures (infos following)    Getting this pledge, you will receive, not only Chaos and High Elves teams with their add-ons, but you will receive also the previous teams: Amazons, Undeads, Dwarves and Orcs, full, hen, king and dices add-ons included! You can find previous releases here:https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crosslance...https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crosslance...And also in our stores:https://www.cgtrader.com/3d-print-models/games-...https://www.cgtrader.com/3d-print-models/games-... All included in this once a lifetime bargain in this kickstarter!Rough and Tumble 2Rough and Tumble 1 for all the buyers of the 60 euro package we decided to add another 4 rows of miniatures:  From left to right:  Giò: proxy miniature for zombiecide  Alice: proxy miniature for zombiecide Lancer girl: a character for RPG or other games  Queen of hearts: character sculpted on the occasion of Valentine's dayAs usual for our kickstarter followers, we will give you a showcase with our classic add.ons of these two new teams!Demon kingElf Kingdraken hen (elf)Er pollo DiabloThe classic tower, for the control point game mod.New diceThe Wyvern!This is an extra, not playable in the game, but still a gorgeous sculpture that we want to make available. (open in the level 2 pledge for 3€, special indiegogor price!)  Demon Bust The Daemon Torso will be available for free only by participating in the Share&Win. You can find all the info HERE. We remind that participating is enough to get the reward. NOT available in the 3€ level 2 pledge.Crosslances studios is founded by 3 artists and their commons passion for the world of games. Students at the Comics courses in Florence, made by the greebo games sculptures, they approached the world of miniatures. It has actually became a revelant studio in the world of miniatures and digital miniatures prototyping. Our products can be found in many places, we had collaborations with: Labmasu, Megalith Godslayer, Hidden Dreams, and many others     https://www.facebook.com/crosslancesstudio&nbsp...  http://www.crosslances.net/

story:
Divination has followed humankind throughout  our existence.  The ancient Celts had Ogham.  The Norse used Runes.  Even older still the Greeks, Chinese, and other cultures practiced osteomancy or Reading the Bones.  There are many ways the human race has sought explanation or to tap into a divine intuition and higher consciousness.  A querent may gain insight into a situation or question by a standardized ritual with a deck of specialized playing cards called Tarot cards.  This unique deck of cards typically is made up of 78 cards which are divided into two sections.  The trump cards number twenty two in count but start with the number zero or the Fool card.  These twenty two cards are called the the Major Arcana.  The other section of fifty six cards make up the the Minor Arcana.  These cards would also represent a standardized deck of playing cards used in present times for games like Bridge or Poker.  This unique Tarot deck contains 21 additional cards called the Elder Arcana, including lesser known cards like the Chance, Primeval Forest,  Healer, and The Messenger cards.

 

Updates will be provided weekly and backers will be given exclusive images as the tarot deck is being completed.  This is a unique way for contributors to see ultimately the birth of this project in its entirety from the initial stages of ink and charcoal drawings to full color images.

 Whereas many decks focus on one given theme or pantheon of deities, we are incorporating a wide array of Mythologies and belief systems into this deck.  From the Chinese Jade Emperor to the Celtic Tuatha De Danaan and on and on with the Greeks and Egyptians, this unique assortment of cards is unlike most decks.

The suits used are based on the Four Treasures from many parallel myths: The Gae Bolga (spears), The Sword of Light (swords), The Cauldron of Dagda (cups), and the Stone of Destiny (coins).

The Minor Arcana each suit will be represented by a specific pantheon of deities.  The Spears cards will be Norse.  The Swords/Clubs will be the Tuatha de Danaan.  The Cups will be Greek.  The Coins will be Egyptian.  We are borrowing from the RWS and Thoth but adding our own impressions for the cards, of course.

The Elder Arcana is what really makes this deck stand out.  Here is a list of the Elder Arcana:

The Primeval Forest

Ceremony

The Sacred Grove

Transformation

Disguise

The Healer

Portal

Calamity

The Library

Victim

Slavery

Battlefield

The Messenger

Release

Solstice

Enigma

Quest

Equinox

Visitor

Black

White

story:
STORY

At the beginning of time, nothing existed but for a strong life force. Over millennia, this force gradually accumulated, intertwined and grew into an enormous, wondrous tree at the edge of the world. This tree called the "Tree of Life", then created soil, stone, and water from which every living being in this world was born.

As time passed, these living beings evolved, expanded and created their own societies of which the major races are the Humans, Elves, Angels Demons, and Werebeasts. The Tree of Life saw all these struggling young races and chose to provide them with the absolute power over this world, the power of "Neokami" with which you can create, destroy and manipulate all living beings. But the Tree of Life loved all races equally and wanted them to compete fair and square, so every 1,000 years a fighting competition is held. There, Champions from each race collects "Blessings of Life" to use as a key to get the "Neo-seed", the source of godly power and with it plant a new powerful tree that will become the "Neokami".

Races

Human race who doubt and dared the god by their force, unbowed to fate, Human ask themselves all the times why their race never received the blessing of the former god,So they tried everything to become the god, in 1000 years human use intelligence and science to replace thing they don’t have is "Technologies" Human almost inferior to any races for 1000 years since the new god rules, because human can’t keep any of magic power from nature only they can do is use their inner  force to break the wooden sheet, so they bring benefit from Magic crystal instead.

Elf, The arrogant, the isolated, the wisest of all race. The Elf race is peaceful, isolated and always natural in any political situation that happens in this world. They are very conservative and very strict to their tradition. Hidden in the deep forest at the end of the land around east of the continent, Elf is really arrogance and ignorance, they believe in the pureblood races and see the other races are inferior. 

The Angels who keep balance of the world, guardian, and watcher, Angels won the great war over 2000 years and conquer the world for 1000 years but after the demons win the election and became the god and weaken the angels,but angels still stronger and powerful in every ways.

The demon race, the god of madness, The absolute of Varisia world, The Demon race is the victor in the last Neokmai event that occurs last century. Demon race is the strongest and they have the most magic power out of all race, in summary, they are superior compared to other races because of the power of God seed, Since then Demon race becomes a new god, Varisia turn in to the dark age. There are chaos, madness, and killing everywhere. 

Werebeast, the outcast, the barbaric. Werebeast is the most pitiful race of all race, they were hated, outcast and not welcomed by every race, their blood is unclean. They are an amalgamation of human and animal, Long long time ago once Werebeast is a human but the higher race like angel and demon want to consume more magic. Human is prey and a perfect target to consume more magic but either lucky or not human don't have any magic essence. 

Game System

Neokami: God Challenger is a strategy board game for 2 to 4 Players with an average playing time of 30 - 60 minutes. Each player uses minion cards as their army to fight for them and collect the god blessings in the middle of the map. Who can collect 6 blessing first will become the new god.

Perks and Pricing

  

                

  

   

 

Video

Risks & Challenges

Creating an Indigogo Project is a great challenge that implies a lot of hard work and sacrifice, which goes from coordinating the gameboard’s production to managing worldwide shipping.

We have learned very much by studying successful projects launched by other gameboard designers and try our best to deliver this product to meet your expectation of our board game.

We are facing several new challenges that will make us grow for sure, in the hope of creating a project you all can be proud of.

 

Shipping

story:
- The story -

 

My name is Ann Dolidze. I work as a psychotherapist.

I have many passions including reading, writing, traveling, social studies and animals. At the age of 25, I decided to challenge myself : create the books I have always dreamed of reading. For 5 years I did not stop writing, I kept a blog and wrote several books. The soul of France speaks to you is the first project that I decided to expose to the general public.

With The Soul of France, I set myself the goal to make you discover the French culture in such depths, that after reading the book you will know this culture in a way that only the French could know it until this day.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In order to offer you the most incredible of experiences, I intended to bring up all the following elements:

 

The beauty

Our inner child's soul is fond of cards. They are miniature paintings that we can take anywhere with us. The final cards will be printed in gold on the edges. The title “The Soul of France speaks to you” on the box and on the book will be golden too.

 

 

The game

The cards can be drawn alone, surrounded by our loved ones or with people we have just met. On a day off, on a bus or at a party. The draw is a surprise, which character would like to address us today?

 

 

 

The knowledge

I have noticed that it’s not by reading massive books that one keeps more information in mind. It seems essential to me to offer historical knowledge in accordance with the reading habits related to our time: synthetic, fast and intense. My goal is to present you life summaries. Free to you, depending on your interests, to delve in the history of your favorite characters according to the media that you like the most.

 

       The List

  1. The painted caves – The heritage
  2.  French wine – L’ivresse
  3.  Héloïse and Abélard  – The couple
  4.  The angel shark – The threat
  5.  100 years war – The conflits
  6.  Jeanne d’Arc – The conviction
  7.  Jean de la Fontaine – The morality
  8.  Nostradamus – The futur
  9.  Molière – The comedy
  10. Jean-Jacques Rousseau – The confession
  11. Denis Diderot – The knowledge
  12. Philippe Pinel – The madness
  13. Marie Antoinette – The superficiality
  14. Storming of the Bastille – The revolt
  15. Napoléon – The power
  16. Grasse – The perfume
  17. Louis Pasteur – The progress
  18. Claude Monet – The landscape
  19. Madame Bovary – The insatisfaction
  20. Lumière brothers – The innovation
  21. Claude de Bussy – The originality
  22. Camille Claudel – The passion
  23. Caroline Otéro – The irresistible
  24. Gustave Doré – The perfectionism
  25. Coco Chanel – The elegance
  26. Victor Hugo – The involvement
  27. Eiffel Tour – The greatness
  28. Céleste Mogador - The scandal
  29. Pétanque – The friendliness
  30. Les poilus – The hardness
  31. Jacques-Yves Cousteau – The exploration
  32. Simone de Beauvoir – The equality
  33. The little prince– The childhood    
  34. Joséphine Baker – Crazy years
  35. Jean moulin – The resistance
  36. Robert Doisneau – The memories
  37. Claude Lévi-Strauss – The differences
  38. Abbey Pierre – The solidarity
  39. Paul Bocuse – The gastronomy
  40. The Mont Blanc – The purity

 

The 40 figures in this list are introduced in chronological order. Beside their name, discover the title of the poem that accompanies them. You do not know most of the figures? It's perfect! I'm glad you will learn a lot!

 

 

 

The Emotion

Each figure has experienced something exceptional. Each figure embodies and symbolizes an aspect of life that we all have experienced in different forms and at different levels.

These modern poems could be song lyrics.

When we draw the cards together, we can also discuss the different notions: "And you Laura, what does Power mean to you?" "Marc, would you like to reach a power as great as that of Napoleon?”

 

The wisdom

Every day we wonder about ourselves. It is always good to congratulate ourselves on the beautiful aspects we are manifesting, and to remember that it is sage to take into consideration certain universal wisdoms for the good of all.

These are suggestions, free to us to welcome them or not, to take them seriously or not.

 

 

Who is the box for?

 

 

  • All the travel, history and poetry lovers.
  • All the France lovers.
  • Anyone who would like to visit or already has visited France.
  • All those who would like to offer a sublime souvenir of France.
  • The French expatriates who would like to share the culture of their own country.
  • The grown-up children of the French diaspora who would appreciate this tool of    transmission.
  • Anyone interested on personal development.
  • Anyone whose favorite movie category is: biopics.
  • Anyone interested on having an original experience.

 

The box will be available in both French and English versions.

 

 

- Our team -

 

This book would have never been created without the encounter and gathering of the best talents in their respective fields. Our team vibrates with passion. Our goal: offering you excellence.

Ann Dolidzé: Founder, poetry and wisdom writer 

Camille Roger: Historian

Merjot Xhelollari : Designer

Iris Johner : Translator

Madina Djoussoeva : Copywriter

 

 

 

 

- Risks & Challenges -

 

Work process

So far :

40 poems on 40 have been written

5 stories on 40 have been written

40 messages on 40 have been written

20 cards on 40 have been designed

5 poems on 40 have been translated

 

The creation process is estimated at 2/3 months. The next step will be the production and shipping. I promise to consistently communicate with the customers in order to keep them updated of our progress. There might be some risks of delay in the production, but whatever problem arises, I will rapidly resolve the issue. There's nothing more important for me than getting your rewards delivered on time.

 

 

- Other Ways You Can Help -

 

  • Please share the campaign with friends and family you think would enjoy it!
  • Give the project a like on the Facebook page: Soul Atlas collection
  • Follow our instagram account: Soul Atlas collection

 I am so grateful for all the love and support I've already received for this project. 

 Thank you all !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 - La grande question -

 

Dans l’histoire de l’humanité, nous n’avons jamais autant voyagé qu’à notre époque. La plupart d’entre nous a visité plusieurs pays et fait la connaissance de personnes venant des quatre coins du monde. Nous avons accès à une multitude de renseignements sur différents pays et leur culture via internet.
Et pourtant que savons-nous vraiment sur les 197 pays que comporte notre terre ? Que ce soit nos pays voisins ou ceux d’autres continents ? 

 

 

 - Mon histoire -

 

Je m’appelle Ann Dolidzé. J’exerce le métier de psychothérapeute.

J’ai plusieurs passions, parmi elles : la lecture, l’écriture, les voyages, les sciences humaines et les animaux. A l’âge de 25 ans, j’ai décidé de me lancer un challenge fou : créer les livres que j’ai toujours rêvé avoir lu. Pendant 5 ans je n’ai pas cessé d’écrire, j’ai tenu un blog et rédigé plusieurs ouvrages. L’âme de la France vous parle est le premier projet que j’ai décidé d’exposer au grand publique.

Je me suis fixée comme défi avec L’âme de la France, de vous faire découvrir la culture française dans une profondeur telle, qu’à la fin de la lecture de ce livre, vous allez connaître cette culture comme seuls les français pouvaient la connaître jusqu’à ce jour.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Traduction de la 4ème de couverture:

A travers 40 cartes à messages magnifiquement illustrées, partez à la découverte des trésors que recèle ce pays. Un livre vous délivrera les secrets d’histoire de ses captivants personnages. Du nord au sud, de ouest en est les origines de ses traditions et de ses œuvres vous seront révélées. Chaque figure vous offre une poésie. Recevez la beauté de ces mots. Sentez votre cœur vibrer. Inspirez-vous de sa force symbolique. Approfondissez cette expérience en recevant les messages personnels emplis de sagesse qui y seront associés.

 

 

Pour vous offrir la plus incroyable expérience qui soit j’ai tenu à apporter tous ces éléments :

 

La beauté 

Notre âme d’enfant affectionne les cartes. Ce sont des tableaux miniatures que nous pouvons emmener partout avec nous. Le contour des cartes ainsi que le titre "L'âme de la France vous parle" sur le coffret et sur le livre seront imprimés en or.

 

Le jeu 

Nous pouvons tirer les cartes seul, entouré de nos proches ou de personnes dont on vient de faire la connaissance. Dans le calme, dans un bus ou dans une soirée. Le tirage est une surprise, quel personnage voudrait s’adresser à nous aujourd’hui ?

 

La connaissance 

J’ai remarqué que ce n’est pas parce que nous lisons de gros livres que nous gardons plus d’information en tête pour autant. Il me semble essentiel de vous offrir des connaissances historiques en accord avec les habitudes de lecture liées à notre temps : synthétique, rapide et intense. Mon objectif est de vous présenter des résumés de vies. Libre à vous, selon vos intérêts de creuser en profondeur l’histoire de vos personnages préférés selon les médias que vous affectionnez le plus.

 

       La liste

  1. Les grottes ornées – L’héritage
  2. Le Mont Blanc – La pureté
  3. L’ange de Mer – La menace
  4. Le vin – L’ivresse
  5. Héloïse et Abélard – Le couple
  6. Jeanne d’Arc – Le courage
  7. Jean de la Fontaine – La morale
  8. Nostradamus – Le futur
  9. Molière – La comédie
  10. Jean-Jacques Rousseau – La confession
  11. Denis Diderot – Le savoir
  12. Philippe Pinel – La folie
  13. Marie Antoinette – La superficialité
  14. La prise de la Bastille – La révolte
  15. Napoléon – Le pouvoir
  16. Grasse- Le parfum
  17. Louis Pasteur – Le progrès
  18. Claude Monet – Le paysage
  19. Madame Bovary – L’insatisfaction
  20. Les frères Lumière – L’innovation
  21. Claude de Bussy – L’originalité
  22. Camille Claudel – La passion
  23. Caroline Otéro – L’inaccessible
  24. Gustave Doré – Le perfectionnisme
  25. Coco Chanel – L’élégance
  26. Victor Hugo – L’engagement
  27. La tour Eiffel – La grandeur
  28. Céleste Mogador – Le scandale
  29. La pétanque – La convivialité
  30. Les poilus – Les épreuves
  31. Jacques-Yves Cousteau – L’exploration
  32. Simone de Beauvoir – L’égalité
  33. Le petit prince – L’enfance
  34. Joséphine Baker – Les années folles
  35. Jean moulin – La résistance
  36. Robert Doisneau – Le souvenir
  37. Claude Lévi-Strauss – Les différences
  38. L’abbé Pierre – La solidarité
  39. Paul Bocuse – La gastronomie
  40. Le panthéon- L’éphémère

 

Les 40 figures de cette liste sont classées par ordre chronologique. A côté de leur nom, découvrez le titre de la poésie qui les accompagne. Vous ne connaissez pas la plupart des figures ou très peu ? C’est parfait ! Je me réjouis que vous allez apprendre beaucoup !

 

 

L’émotion 

Chaque figure a expérimenté quelque chose d’exceptionnel. Chaque figure incarne et symbolise un aspect de la vie que nous avons tous personnellement vécu sous différentes formes et à différents degrés.

Ces poésies modernes pourraient être des paroles de chanson.

Si nous tirons les cartes à plusieurs, nous pouvons également débattre sur les différentes notions : « Et toi Laura, c’est quoi le pouvoir pour toi ? » « Marc, voudrais-tu atteindre un pouvoir aussi grand que celui de Napoléon ?

 

La sagesse 

Tous les jours, nous nous posons des questions sur nous-même. Il est toujours bon de se féliciter pour les beaux aspects que nous manifestons, et de se rappeler qu’il serait plus avisé  de prendre en considération certaines sagesses universelles pour le bien de tous.

Ce sont des suggestions, libre à nous de les accueillir ou pas, de les prendre au sérieux ou pas.

 

 

 A qui se coffret s’adresse-t-il ? 

 

 

  • Tous les amoureux de voyage, d’histoire et de poésie.
  • Tous ceux qui aiment la France
  • Tous ceux qui voudraient visiter la France ou l’on déjà visité.
  • Tous ceux qui voudraient offrir un sublime souvenir de France.
  • Les expatriés français qui voudraient partager la culture de leur pays.
  • Les enfants (adultes) de la diaspora française qui apprécieront cet outil de transmission.
  • Tous ceux qui sont intéressés par le développement personnel.
  • Tous ceux dont la catégorie de films préférée est : autobiographie.
  • Tous ceux intéressés par une expérience originale.

 

Le coffret sera disponible en version française ainsi qu'en version anglaise.

 

 

- Notre équipe -

 

Cet ouvrage n’aurait jamais pu voir le jour si je n’avais eu la chance de rencontrer les meilleurs talents dans leur domaines respectifs. Notre équipe vibre de par sa passion. Notre but : vous offrir l’excellence.

Ann Dolidzé: Fondatrice, auteur des poésies et des messages de guidance

Camille Roger: Historien

Merjot Xhelollari : Designer

Iris Johner : Traductrice

Madina Djoussoeva : Copywriter

 

 

 

- Risques et Challenges -

 

Travail en cours

Jusqu'à ce jour :

40 poésies sur 40 sont rédigées

5 histoires sur 40 sont rédigées

40 messages sur 40 sont rédigés

20 cartes sur 40 sont  illustrées

5 poésies sur 40 sont traduites

 

Le processus de création est estimé à 2/3  mois. Les étapes suivante seront la production et l'envoie. Je m'engage à communiquer continuellement aux clients des informations sur l'évolution de l'entreprise. Bien sûr, des risques de retard dans la production peuvent subvenir. Mais quel que soit le problème, je le résoudrai dans les plus brefs délais. Il n'y a rien de plus important pour moi que de vous livrer à temps.

 

 

 - Votre aide m'est précieuse - 

 

  • S'il vous plaît, partagez la campagne avec tous ceux qui pourraient apprécier ce projet.
  • Suivez mon aventure sur la page Facebook: Soul Atlas collection
  • Suivez mon compte Instagram: Soul Atlas collection

Je suis si reconnaissante pour tout l'amour et le soutien que beaucoup m'ont témoigné.

 Merci à tous !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
story_txt:
- The story -
 
My name is Ann Dolidze. I work as a psychotherapist.
I have many passions including reading, writing, traveling, social studies and animals. At the age of 25, I decided to challenge myself : create the books I have always dreamed of reading. For 5 years I did not stop writing, I kept a blog and wrote several books. The soul of France speaks to you is the first project that I decided to expose to the general public.
With The Soul of France, I set myself the goal to make you discover the French culture in such depths, that after reading the book you will know this culture in a way that only the French could know it until this day.
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
In order to offer you the most incredible of experiences, I intended to bring up all the following elements:
 
The beauty
Our inner child's soul is fond of cards. They are miniature paintings that we can take anywhere with us. The final cards will be printed in gold on the edges. The title “The Soul of France speaks to you” on the box and on the book will be golden too.
 

 
The game
The cards can be drawn alone, surrounded by our loved ones or with people we have just met. On a day off, on a bus or at a party. The draw is a surprise, which character would like to address us today?
 
 
 
The knowledge
I have noticed that it’s not by reading massive books that one keeps more information in mind. It seems essential to me to offer historical knowledge in accordance with the reading habits related to our time: synthetic, fast and intense. My goal is to present you life summaries. Free to you, depending on your interests, to delve in the history of your favorite characters according to the media that you like the most.
 
       The List

The painted caves – The heritage
 French wine – L’ivresse
 Héloïse and Abélard  – The couple
 The angel shark – The threat
 100 years war – The conflits
 Jeanne d’Arc – The conviction
 Jean de la Fontaine – The morality
 Nostradamus – The futur
 Molière – The comedy
Jean-Jacques Rousseau – The confession
Denis Diderot – The knowledge
Philippe Pinel – The madness
Marie Antoinette – The superficiality
Storming of the Bastille – The revolt
Napoléon – The power
Grasse – The perfume
Louis Pasteur – The progress
Claude Monet – The landscape
Madame Bovary – The insatisfaction
Lumière brothers – The innovation
Claude de Bussy – The originality
Camille Claudel – The passion
Caroline Otéro – The irresistible
Gustave Doré – The perfectionism
Coco Chanel – The elegance
Victor Hugo – The involvement
Eiffel Tour – The greatness
Céleste Mogador - The scandal
Pétanque – The friendliness
Les poilus – The hardness
Jacques-Yves Cousteau – The exploration
Simone de Beauvoir – The equality
The little prince– The childhood    
Joséphine Baker – Crazy years
Jean moulin – The resistance
Robert Doisneau – The memories
Claude Lévi-Strauss – The differences
Abbey Pierre – The solidarity
Paul Bocuse – The gastronomy
The Mont Blanc – The purity

 
The 40 figures in this list are introduced in chronological order. Beside their name, discover the title of the poem that accompanies them. You do not know most of the figures? It's perfect! I'm glad you will learn a lot!
 

 
 
The Emotion
Each figure has experienced something exceptional. Each figure embodies and symbolizes an aspect of life that we all have experienced in different forms and at different levels.
These modern poems could be song lyrics.
When we draw the cards together, we can also discuss the different notions: "And you Laura, what does Power mean to you?" "Marc, would you like to reach a power as great as that of Napoleon?”
 
The wisdom
Every day we wonder about ourselves. It is always good to congratulate ourselves on the beautiful aspects we are manifesting, and to remember that it is sage to take into consideration certain universal wisdoms for the good of all.
These are suggestions, free to us to welcome them or not, to take them seriously or not.
 
 
Who is the box for?
 

 

All the travel, history and poetry lovers.
All the France lovers.
Anyone who would like to visit or already has visited France.
All those who would like to offer a sublime souvenir of France.
The French expatriates who would like to share the culture of their own country.
The grown-up children of the French diaspora who would appreciate this tool of    transmission.
Anyone interested on personal development.
Anyone whose favorite movie category is: biopics.
Anyone interested on having an original experience.

 
The box will be available in both French and English versions.
 
 
- Our team -
 
This book would have never been created without the encounter and gathering of the best talents in their respective fields. Our team vibrates with passion. Our goal: offering you excellence.
Ann Dolidzé: Founder, poetry and wisdom writer 
Camille Roger: Historian
Merjot Xhelollari : Designer
Iris Johner : Translator
Madina Djoussoeva : Copywriter
 
 

 
 
- Risks & Challenges -
 
Work process
So far :
40 poems on 40 have been written
5 stories on 40 have been written
40 messages on 40 have been written
20 cards on 40 have been designed
5 poems on 40 have been translated
 
The creation process is estimated at 2/3 months. The next step will be the production and shipping. I promise to consistently communicate with the customers in order to keep them updated of our progress. There might be some risks of delay in the production, but whatever problem arises, I will rapidly resolve the issue. There's nothing more important for me than getting your rewards delivered on time.
 
 
- Other Ways You Can Help -

 

Please share the campaign with friends and family you think would enjoy it!
Give the project a like on the Facebook page: Soul Atlas collection
Follow our instagram account: Soul Atlas collection

 I am so grateful for all the love and support I've already received for this project. 
 Thank you all !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
 
 
 
 
 
 

 - La grande question -
 
Dans l’histoire de l’humanité, nous n’avons jamais autant voyagé qu’à notre époque. La plupart d’entre nous a visité plusieurs pays et fait la connaissance de personnes venant des quatre coins du monde. Nous avons accès à une multitude de renseignements sur différents pays et leur culture via internet.Et pourtant que savons-nous vraiment sur les 197 pays que comporte notre terre ? Que ce soit nos pays voisins ou ceux d’autres continents ? 
 
 
 - Mon histoire -
 
Je m’appelle Ann Dolidzé. J’exerce le métier de psychothérapeute.
J’ai plusieurs passions, parmi elles : la lecture, l’écriture, les voyages, les sciences humaines et les animaux. A l’âge de 25 ans, j’ai décidé de me lancer un challenge fou : créer les livres que j’ai toujours rêvé avoir lu. Pendant 5 ans je n’ai pas cessé d’écrire, j’ai tenu un blog et rédigé plusieurs ouvrages. L’âme de la France vous parle est le premier projet que j’ai décidé d’exposer au grand publique.
Je me suis fixée comme défi avec L’âme de la France, de vous faire découvrir la culture française dans une profondeur telle, qu’à la fin de la lecture de ce livre, vous allez connaître cette culture comme seuls les français pouvaient la connaître jusqu’à ce jour.
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Traduction de la 4ème de couverture:
A travers 40 cartes à messages magnifiquement illustrées, partez à la découverte des trésors que recèle ce pays. Un livre vous délivrera les secrets d’histoire de ses captivants personnages. Du nord au sud, de ouest en est les origines de ses traditions et de ses œuvres vous seront révélées. Chaque figure vous offre une poésie. Recevez la beauté de ces mots. Sentez votre cœur vibrer. Inspirez-vous de sa force symbolique. Approfondissez cette expérience en recevant les messages personnels emplis de sagesse qui y seront associés.
 
 
Pour vous offrir la plus incroyable expérience qui soit j’ai tenu à apporter tous ces éléments :
 
La beauté 
Notre âme d’enfant affectionne les cartes. Ce sont des tableaux miniatures que nous pouvons emmener partout avec nous. Le contour des cartes ainsi que le titre "L'âme de la France vous parle" sur le coffret et sur le livre seront imprimés en or.

 
Le jeu 
Nous pouvons tirer les cartes seul, entouré de nos proches ou de personnes dont on vient de faire la connaissance. Dans le calme, dans un bus ou dans une soirée. Le tirage est une surprise, quel personnage voudrait s’adresser à nous aujourd’hui ?
 
La connaissance 
J’ai remarqué que ce n’est pas parce que nous lisons de gros livres que nous gardons plus d’information en tête pour autant. Il me semble essentiel de vous offrir des connaissances historiques en accord avec les habitudes de lecture liées à notre temps : synthétique, rapide et intense. Mon objectif est de vous présenter des résumés de vies. Libre à vous, selon vos intérêts de creuser en profondeur l’histoire de vos personnages préférés selon les médias que vous affectionnez le plus.
 
       La liste

Les grottes ornées – L’héritage
Le Mont Blanc – La pureté
L’ange de Mer – La menace
Le vin – L’ivresse
Héloïse et Abélard – Le couple
Jeanne d’Arc – Le courage
Jean de la Fontaine – La morale
Nostradamus – Le futur
Molière – La comédie
Jean-Jacques Rousseau – La confession
Denis Diderot – Le savoir
Philippe Pinel – La folie
Marie Antoinette – La superficialité
La prise de la Bastille – La révolte
Napoléon – Le pouvoir
Grasse- Le parfum
Louis Pasteur – Le progrès
Claude Monet – Le paysage
Madame Bovary – L’insatisfaction
Les frères Lumière – L’innovation
Claude de Bussy – L’originalité
Camille Claudel – La passion
Caroline Otéro – L’inaccessible
Gustave Doré – Le perfectionnisme
Coco Chanel – L’élégance
Victor Hugo – L’engagement
La tour Eiffel – La grandeur
Céleste Mogador – Le scandale
La pétanque – La convivialité
Les poilus – Les épreuves
Jacques-Yves Cousteau – L’exploration
Simone de Beauvoir – L’égalité
Le petit prince – L’enfance
Joséphine Baker – Les années folles
Jean moulin – La résistance
Robert Doisneau – Le souvenir
Claude Lévi-Strauss – Les différences
L’abbé Pierre – La solidarité
Paul Bocuse – La gastronomie
Le panthéon- L’éphémère

 
Les 40 figures de cette liste sont classées par ordre chronologique. A côté de leur nom, découvrez le titre de la poésie qui les accompagne. Vous ne connaissez pas la plupart des figures ou très peu ? C’est parfait ! Je me réjouis que vous allez apprendre beaucoup !
 

 
L’émotion 
Chaque figure a expérimenté quelque chose d’exceptionnel. Chaque figure incarne et symbolise un aspect de la vie que nous avons tous personnellement vécu sous différentes formes et à différents degrés.
Ces poésies modernes pourraient être des paroles de chanson.
Si nous tirons les cartes à plusieurs, nous pouvons également débattre sur les différentes notions : « Et toi Laura, c’est quoi le pouvoir pour toi ? » « Marc, voudrais-tu atteindre un pouvoir aussi grand que celui de Napoléon ?
 
La sagesse 
Tous les jours, nous nous posons des questions sur nous-même. Il est toujours bon de se féliciter pour les beaux aspects que nous manifestons, et de se rappeler qu’il serait plus avisé  de prendre en considération certaines sagesses universelles pour le bien de tous.
Ce sont des suggestions, libre à nous de les accueillir ou pas, de les prendre au sérieux ou pas.
 
 
 A qui se coffret s’adresse-t-il ? 
 

 

Tous les amoureux de voyage, d’histoire et de poésie.
Tous ceux qui aiment la France
Tous ceux qui voudraient visiter la France ou l’on déjà visité.
Tous ceux qui voudraient offrir un sublime souvenir de France.
Les expatriés français qui voudraient partager la culture de leur pays.
Les enfants (adultes) de la diaspora française qui apprécieront cet outil de transmission.
Tous ceux qui sont intéressés par le développement personnel.
Tous ceux dont la catégorie de films préférée est : autobiographie.
Tous ceux intéressés par une expérience originale.

 
Le coffret sera disponible en version française ainsi qu'en version anglaise.
 
 
- Notre équipe -
 
Cet ouvrage n’aurait jamais pu voir le jour si je n’avais eu la chance de rencontrer les meilleurs talents dans leur domaines respectifs. Notre équipe vibre de par sa passion. Notre but : vous offrir l’excellence.
Ann Dolidzé: Fondatrice, auteur des poésies et des messages de guidance
Camille Roger: Historien
Merjot Xhelollari : Designer
Iris Johner : Traductrice
Madina Djoussoeva : Copywriter
 

 
 
- Risques et Challenges -
 
Travail en cours
Jusqu'à ce jour :
40 poésies sur 40 sont rédigées
5 histoires sur 40 sont rédigées
40 messages sur 40 sont rédigés
20 cartes sur 40 sont  illustrées
5 poésies sur 40 sont traduites
 
Le processus de création est estimé à 2/3  mois. Les étapes suivante seront la production et l'envoie. Je m'engage à communiquer continuellement aux clients des informations sur l'évolution de l'entreprise. Bien sûr, des risques de retard dans la production peuvent subvenir. Mais quel que soit le problème, je le résoudrai dans les plus brefs délais. Il n'y a rien de plus important pour moi que de vous livrer à temps.
 
 
 - Votre aide m'est précieuse - 
 

S'il vous plaît, partagez la campagne avec tous ceux qui pourraient apprécier ce projet.
Suivez mon aventure sur la page Facebook: Soul Atlas collection
Suivez mon compte Instagram: Soul Atlas collection

Je suis si reconnaissante pour tout l'amour et le soutien que beaucoup m'ont témoigné.
 Merci à tous !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

story:
Whether you are a board game junkie, a blockchain fanatic or just someone who wants to sound smarter when people start talking about internet money, Crypto is the strategy board game for everyone. Incorporating 8 different real-life cryptocurrencies, Crypto is a 3-6 player auction-based board game that is played over four rounds. The rules are deceptively simple: whoever has the most money by the end of the fourth round wins.

Don't be fooled by the simplicity of such a task because there are 8 different cryptocurrencies to play and 4 auction types for each cryptocurrency. At the start of Crypto, each player is dealt a set amount of cards depending on the number of players in the game. Each card represents a certain cryptocurrency and its individual auction type. For example, the first player may play a Bitcoin Vickrey Auction where every player secretly selects the amount they are willing to pay and reveals it at once. Whoever reveals the highest price pays an amount equal to the second highest bidder. 

The three other auction types are:

The English Auction: The price starts at $0 and rises until someone accepts a price first.

The Dutch Auction: The price starts at an above average price set by the auctioneer and decreases until someone accepts a price first.

The Fixed Price Auction: The auctioneer sets a fixed price on the cryptocurrency and then it is auctioned in clockwise order.

Beware though, because every coin must be bought when it is auctioned. If you set a fixed price auction too high, you'll be the one paying for it.

A round ends when the fifth card of a certain cryptocurrency is played. The most played cryptocurrency gets an added valuation of $30 million (gold coin), the second most played gets an added valuation of $20 million (silver coin), the third most played gets an added valuation of $10 million (bronze coin), and the rest get no added valuation. You can then choose to sell your own bought cryptocurrency to cash out now or hold on to them in hopes of greater future valuation.

Watch out, because as the game goes on, event cards become crucial. The four event card are Rumors, Hacks, Sell-offs, and Hard Forks, each with a unique effect on overall gameplay.

Learn more about the rules and find answers to your questions here:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/19eFk_HzbW3Z...

 

Risks & Challenges

The purpose of the Kickstarter campaign for Crypto is to fund manufacturing and inventory costs to mass-produce a board game for our backers. We want our backers to experience a modern, strategic, family game that we created out of our collective passion for board games and cryptocurrency.

The design, functionality, and dimensions of the board and cards have already been established. Multiple prototypes have already been created so the design is completely done. The biggest challenge will come with finalizing a manufacturer to produce the game and the diverse array of cards needed. Luckily, our team is already in high-level talks with multiple manufacturers, and this problem will surely be alleviated through extended sampling.

story:
Summary

Ganja is a fun new card game. With the Ganja card game, you socialize while also learning about the biology and perils of farming weed (Cannabis sativa). You will have fun growing your garden and protecting it from a range of action cards including aphids, deer, rabbits, frost, fire, male plants and many more!

 

What We Need & What You Get?

We want people to access and play the Ganja card game now, at an affordable price. We are raising crowdsourced funds to place a bulk print order of decks, allowing supporters to see a significant discount on the cost price of each deck. Try the new Ganja card game, it's a must for your next games night!

 

How the game is played and won?

Each player starts 4 cards in their hand. Players take turns drawing one card from the deck and putting one card into play. For each play/turn, you will have a choice or planting, or using action cards to slow down the progress of your competitors, or neutralizing and action card you might have received from another player. The goal is to grow your farm by placing a female plant card in front of you, face up so that all can see. To close a round simply place 6 female plant cards in your farm, the person who grows the most plants wins the game.

If you want a longer game simply tally points over three rounds. Several fun action cards are available to slow your competitors while teaching everyone about the biology and perils of farming weed.

 

Two Card Games: Ganja 1 and Ganja 2

Ganja 1: The Original

Grow the largest crop fastest. Get 54 poker-sized cards including offensive cards to slow your competitors and defensive cards to protect your plants

Ganja 1: Offensive cards

- Kangaroos: steal largest plant card, and adds to your farm
- Edibles: skip a turn
- Raided: lose all but four plants
- Male Plant: pollinates all plants, discard all cards, unless defended by playing a "Gardener" card
- Aphids: eat the largest plant card each turn until no card is left, or they play a Ladybug
- Rabbit: eat the smallest plant card

Ganja 1: Defensive cards

- Ladybug: defend against "Aphid" card
- Gardener: pulls out male plants, and the female plants from being pollinated

 

Ganja 2: The Expansion Pack

Ganja is more fun to play with more action and plant cards, get the "expansion pack" and enjoy less shuffling, allow more players, and have a more intense gameplay experience. Get 54 additional poker-sized cards with more plant cards and new offensive and defensive cards including;

Ganja 2: Offensive cards

- Monkeys: steal the smallest plant card and add to your farm
- Fire: burn the whole garden, discard all cards
- Frost: freeze the whole garden, discard all cards
- Deer: eat the largest plant card
- Grasshopper: eat the lowest plant card each turn until no card is left, unless defended by playing a “Chameleon” card
- Snail: eat the lowest plant card each turn until no card is left, unless defended by playing a “Chameleon” card

Ganja 2: Defensive cards

- Chameleon: defend against “Snail” and “Grasshopper” cards

 

Worldwide Shipping, Tax & Duty?

We will ship to supporters anywhere in the world. There should be no import tax and custom duty issues for shipments to US addresses. There should also be no import tax and custom duty issues for shipments to Australia (on orders of up to CA$1130.50 excluding shipping costs), Canada (on orders of up to CA$23.94 excluding shipping costs) and to UK and EU countries (on orders of up to CA$399.00 excluding shipping costs shipped via standard shipping method). The recipients are responsible for any customs duty or tax imposed by their country. Please check with your local government agency or contact us for more information.

 

Risks and challenges

We don't anticipate any delays because we have the designs ready and have raised much of the funding needed to place the bulk order on Kickstarter. We sincerely thank you for your support and hope you love the Ganja card game as much as we do ;-) If we get 1000 for a particular perk then we will print your playing cards on even better material (available only to limited print runs of 1000 decks).

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
Please help us by sharing the Ganja card game with your friends, it's easy using the Indiegogo share tools!

Ganja is more fun to play with more action and plant cards, get the "expansion pack" and enjoy less shuffling, allow more players, and have a more intense gameplay experience. Get 54 additional poker-sized cards with more plant cards and new offensive and defensive cards including;
Ganja 2: Offensive cards
- Monkeys: steal the smallest plant card and add to your farm- Fire: burn the whole garden, discard all cards- Frost: freeze the whole garden, discard all cards- Deer: eat the largest plant card- Grasshopper: eat the lowest plant card each turn until no card is left, unless defended by playing a “Chameleon” card- Snail: eat the lowest plant card each turn until no card is left, unless defended by playing a “Chameleon” cardGanja 2: Defensive cards
- Chameleon: defend against “Snail” and “Grasshopper” cards
 
Worldwide Shipping, Tax & Duty?
We will ship to supporters anywhere in the world. There should be no import tax and custom duty issues for shipments to US addresses. There should also be no import tax and custom duty issues for shipments to Australia (on orders of up to CA$1130.50 excluding shipping costs), Canada (on orders of up to CA$23.94 excluding shipping costs) and to UK and EU countries (on orders of up to CA$399.00 excluding shipping costs shipped via standard shipping method). The recipients are responsible for any customs duty or tax imposed by their country. Please check with your local government agency or contact us for more information. Risks and challenges
We don't anticipate any delays because we have the designs ready and have raised much of the funding needed to place the bulk order on Kickstarter. We sincerely thank you for your support and hope you love the Ganja card game as much as we do ;-) If we get 1000 for a particular perk then we will print your playing cards on even better material (available only to limited print runs of 1000 decks). Other Ways You Can Help
We know that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:Please help us by sharing the Ganja card game with your friends, it's easy using the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The World of Ere Roleplaying Game is a dungeonpunk/steampunk fantasy game built using the D20 and Pathfinder SRDs. It is set in the World of Ere, the setting for the Rune Breaker fantasy series by Landon Porter and geared toward cinematic storytelling and action-adventure oriented play.

 

Among its features:

 

Fun At Level One

There are no level one pig farmers in WoE. The system is meant to allow play that more closely follows modern Fantasy stories where the characters start competent at what they do, capable of great deeds and impressive feats.

 

At level one, all WoE characters are fully capable of fulfilling the expectations of their class: spell casters can cast spells, including zero-cost spells that can use at any time, martial characters know combat techniques that allow them to do battle against enemies, all characters have feats to further refine their abilities, and also have enough hit points that they can participate in battle without dying instantly.

 

Encounter-based Design

The Encounter is the basic element of the game: combat, social and puzzle encounters are all taken into account. Limited use resources including many abilities, spell points and martial fatigue points replenish either entirely or partially after each encounter and enemies are designed with their role and use in an encounter environment in mind.

 

Feat-centric Character Design

Feats form the core of the WoE system. Feats are designed to both scale with level and each either grant characters additional abilities or expand upon abilities they already have. No feat grants simple bonuses and there are no 'trap' feats.

 

Feat paths also perform the function of Prestige Classes from earlier editions, allowing a character to gain a specific set of abilities to fulfill a new role such as the Drunken Master, the Pyromancer, the Audacious Highwayman, and the Shadowstep.

 

Three Tiers of Play

Levels are split into three tiers of play: 1-8, 9-17 and 18-20. Each level advancement within a given tier increases a character's competence and versatility, but not their overall power while the transition between tiers roughly doubles the power level of all characters.

 

Spells, Martial Techniques, Feats and Class Features are all delineated by tier. The initial game features Tier 1 play with the ability to play at higher tiers with limited support.

 

Martial/Caster Balance

Martial characters have abilities on par with caster spells. The difference between martial characters and casters is that the martial resource recharges completely after each encounter to power a small number of different abilities while the caster resource only recharges partially each encounter to power a large variety of abilities. All characters also have access to feats that grant them additional abilities as well as spell-like rituals.

 

A Robust Combat System

The World of Ere RPG system is geared toward kinetic, cinematic combat. Characters can move freely between actions, move other characters around, and have access to a large number of combat maneuvers via a rebalanced version of the Combat Maneuvers mechanic from the Pathfinder SRD.

 

Maneuvers include Push, Reposition, and Grab, all of which require only a single opposed die roll to resolve and carry no inherent penalties.

 

The Expertise System

In an effort to balance adventuring skills with every day skills and hobbies such as crafting, performance and profession, the Expertise system allows characters to have those mundane skills without reducing their competence as adventurers.

 

Choosing expertises grants a floating bonus to tasks involving that expertise rather than a specific skill roll, as well as a base roll to perform challenges such as crafting masterpieces.

 

Narrative Control

WoE offers players many options to help control their role in the story being told. From feats that create relationships with NPCs, to Action Points that allow them to pull off exciting stunts and guidelines for the DM to allow players to further customize their characters' actions and attributes to suit their needs. The flavor provided by the rules are expressly suggestions, subject to change as the players see fit.

 

Tons of Options

At launch, the game will feature over 200 feats, 30 martial techniques, 100 spells, 50 rituals and 50 superior items including two dozen feat paths, specific spells for clerics of ten gods, at least five in-class variants for each class. Add in skills and expertises and the combinations with just the base game are endless.

story:
The concept was born from love.  Let me explain.  My fiancé and I went to a football game party.  We were new in our relationship, so we were very affectionate to each other.  During commercial breaks, we were giggling and kissing a lot.  We were kissing so much that someone in the room started making fun of us, tossing down their paper towel, like a real foul flag yelling, “Flag on the play!”  We all laughed, but after receiving countless paper towel flags and comments, we decided that we could actually make a game out of this and that’s how this journey began.  By the way…we’re still kissing!

 

 

Short Summary

Flag on the Play will give you a real-time, interactive football game experience.  This game allows you to actually participate, as you watch pre-recorded or live football games, played on your TV.  It gives everyone the opportunity to learn the rules, laws and regulations of football in a fun and exciting way. Even a young fan can understand the rules and instructions to this game. Want to test your knowledge of football? This game can surely do that, but don’t be too quick to think you know it all…even an amateur has a great chance of winning. Remember, it’s the first flag that goes down, that has the chance to score. So, you still have to be quick.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

·       Thank you for your donation of $10.00 or more.

·       $55 gets you 1 free game including Shipping and handling.

·       $110 or more gets you 2 free game, including shipping and handling.

·       $150 or more gets you 3 free games including shipping and handling.

·       $300 or more gets you 4 free games including shipping and handling.

·       $500 or more gets you 5 free games including shipping and handling.

·       $1000 or more gets you 8 free games, including shipping and handling.

The Impact

Believe it or not watching football provides both physical exercise and is good for the mind, body and spirit. Furthermore, playing any team sport, with family and friends is good for learning accountability, dedication, and leadership, among many other traits. Putting friends and family, even strangers together, by playing a sport is a winning combination, even if it’s a board game.

This unique football game will help in memorization, repetition and learning new rules and regulations to the game.  It will help players, coaches, managers to teach the game and build a collective team synergy and effectively solve problems or misunderstanding of how football is played. This game brings people together, both young and old.  It is the ultimate game that will bring the world together in understanding the great game of football.

Risks & Challenges

The greatest risk and challenge is, not having this game at your next football party...people might not show up.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

The best way you can help is, spreading the word about, "Flag on the Play!"  No home should be without it.  If your favorite team comes on TV, you're gonna wish either you had it or your family and friends had one.
