story:
What is it?

Counting Sleep is a fast-paced, family-friendly card game where players compete during a charity gaming marathon in order to stay awake the longest. Use cards to boost yourself, hinder your competitors or change the rules completely - but most importantly, don't pick up the sleep cards!

This campaign has been set up to fund the production of the game and the backer rewards only, and all profit after manufacturing costs will go directly to SpecialEffect.

Go on...

You and your fellow players have decided to participate in a Charity Gaming Marathon, however, you're all vying to steal the glory and be the one who stays awake the longest, leaving your 'team-mates' snoring loudly in their beds. In order to achieve this feat of endurance and emerge victorious, you're going to have to keep yourself awake whilst making everyone else feel sleepy.....veeeery sleeepy.

Using the cards in the deck you can play items on yourself or others to focus on keeping yourself alert, sabotage your competitors or a mix of both. Each time the game changes, the rules do too so be sure to keep an eye on the #NowPlaying deck!

Each turn involves three stages:

1. Deal with any card that has been played in front of you (either by yourself or someone else)

2. Draw a card from any available draw piles on the table (there might be more than one!)*

3. Play a card on yourself, someone else or to the discard pile.*

(*You can do step 2 & 3 either way around)

Here come's the risky part: each card has a number on the back. This number indicates the likelihood of the card being a Sleep card. If you draw a Sleep card your turn ends and that number gets added to your current hours slept. When all 10 Sleep cards have been drawn, the game ends - turn over your sleep cards and reveal who will take the glory with the least amount of hours slept!

Counting Sleep is suitable for 2 - 10 players of all ages and abilities. Play tactically if you're a strategist, play it safe if you're the cautious type or simply cause as much chaos as you can before the last sleep card is drawn.

Who are we?

We are three avid gamers (video and card) who feel passionately about raising money for SpecialEffect. We are all currently ambassadors for the charity and are part of a team who take part in a 4-day gaming marathon for them every year. 

One of us had a great idea for a card game, and decided that they'd like to develop the idea into a product but with all profits going to the charity. From there we have honed the idea to make what we think is a great way to spend an afternoon!

What We Need & What You Get

The minimum amount needed to fund Counting Sleep has been calculated according to the handy pie chart below! We reached this figure by factoring in manufacturing costs (based on minumum order quantities) of the game itself along with the rewards we think you're going to love as well; as making sure that each level leaves us with enough to send a donation to SpecialEffect.

We have also factored in £700 worth of contingency which will go towards any unforeseen costs due to changes in supplier or manufacturing processes beyond our control. Anything left from this contingency will be donated directly to SpecialEffect.

In exchange for your support in getting this project off the ground you will recieve exclusive backer rewards which we're really very proud of, and hope you'll love as much as we do! Depending on the level you choose to back us at, these include stickers, t-shirts, limited edition nightcaps and your very own 6" plush Winston the Sheep, who you may recognise from our video above!

The Impact

As well as netting you a copy of the game which we have poured our heart and soul into over a period of several years, and any rewards you choose, your contribution will make a difference to people's lives in real-time by allowing us to send money to SpecialEffect. 

"By using technology ranging from modified joypads to eye-control, we're finding a way for people to play to the very best of their abilities. But we're not just doing it for fun. By levelling the playing field, we're bringing families and friends together and having a profoundly positive impact on therapy, confidence and rehabilitation." - SpecialEffect

To find out more about what SpecialEffect do and who they help, head to http://www.specialeffect.org.uk

Risks & Challenges

We already have some excellent suppliers lined up to help us out and have prototypes of some of our perks. We are trying to work with ethical and independent suppliers as much as we can, however, we recognise that sometimes life gets in the way of good intentions and occassionally agreed deals fall through. In order to mitigate the impact of this as much as we can, we already have back-up suppliers scoped out and a contingency budget to cover any extra costs we may incur.

There are minimum order quantities for various items we will be including in this campaign, and there is a risk we will not raise enough in order to meet those quantities. In order to avoid this happening, we have chosen to use the fixed funding model for this campaign, which means that if we do not reach the minumum amount outlined above, the campaign will not go ahead and no one will be charged.

Being a team of three, we realise that we're only small, but we are also mighty! In the event that one of us is unable to continue to commit to the project, we feel that the remaining members are well equipped enough to continue with minimal disruption by making the whole team aware of all the moving parts involved in the process, and giving them access to any online accounts that are required.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that times are hard, and you may be unable to contribute your money to this campaign - however, if you feel you'd still like to help you can do so by shouting about us from the rooftops!* 

Every share on social media means the world to us and only takes a few seconds. There are even social media sharing buttons at the top of this page which will do all the heavy lifting for you.

If you are an event organiser and feel that you would like to offer us some space at your event to demonstrate Counting Sleep, a supplier who thinks they can offer us a deal we can't refuse, or if you feel you can help us out in any other way please feel free to get in touch with us by emailing info@countingsleepgame.co.uk

*maybe not literally.

story:
Murder & Co. is a crime-solving subscription box game that mixes storytelling, puzzle-solving, and code cracking, with curated gifts that often act as clues or evidence.  Each story consists of six episodes, and will be delivered to your door monthly. With an obsessive attention to detail, we present a deeply immersive and narrative-driven mystery game that is no walk in the park, so we are looking for only the sharpest knives in the butcher block to help solve the case. The best part-no dark parks or danger necessary, as you can do it all from the comfort of your own home.

 

Murder & Co. is a crime-solving subscription box game that mixes storytelling, puzzle-solving, and code cracking, with curated gifts that often act as clues or evidence.  Each story consists of six episodes, and will be delivered to your door monthly. With an obsessive attention to detail, we present a deeply immersive and narrative-driven mystery game that is no walk in the park, so we are looking for only the sharpest knives in the butcher block to help solve the case. The best part- no dark parks or danger necessary, as you can do it all from the comfort of your own home.

Strategize. Work the investigation. Every item in the box is a clue. Sort through the codes and study every document. You are the detective! Build a crime scene board, take notes and study the characters. Stay organized! Investigate, deduce and solve each episode of the series- eliminating suspects by using codes, ciphers, and physical evidence as clues until the killer is discovered.

Each case will pull you into the world of the victim as you become the investigator. Whether you are on the campus of an Ivy League University, in 1970's Hollywood or swept up into the dark underbelly of Voodoo and magic, our curated gifts will not only bring you a lavish crime-solving experience, they will often act as clues. 

Beware... nothing is easy, and as any good detective will tell you, the red herrings are a continual cause of distraction.

Who Killed Piper?

Our inaugural story is called Snow Angel.  In the early hours of December 14, 2006, the body of a beautiful young student is found in the snowy cemetery, on the campus of the prestigious Ivy League University, New Cambridge. The police department quickly closes the case but Susan Gladstone, the campus police officer who discovered the co-ed, has some doubts about the coroner's findings. Susan is torn between her husband's job as a New Cambridge police detective and the secret society who may have had a hand in the students death. Was the student pushed to commit suicide or was it murder?

Email your answers to each box's objective, and if you're right, we'll prepare the next month's box!

Exclusive digital downloads only available to Backers.

No spoilers to the story, you'll be the first to play the game.

We'll know you're awesome, that you love murder mystery too, and that you have great taste!

What makes Murder & Co. different from other murder mystery games on the market?


We are Christian Davidson-Nonner, Melanie Monroe, and Taylor Stanley, longtime friends also known as the Murder Mamas. We played a crime solving game using video chat at the beginning of the pandemic lockdown, and we loved it. So we took the opportunity to put our mutual love of True Crime and our collective backgrounds in film & television to work, and jump into the gaming community by putting our own spin on the murder mystery subscription box. We created a game unlike any on the market today, that marries intelligent crime solving with rad, curated gifts, because who doesn't like Murder AND Gifts? 

Also, we like to be fancy. 

While we might be obsessed with murder, we realize that violence isn’t a game. We are dedicated to raising awareness about violence by donating to victims, and the families of victims, of violent crime. A percentage of your purchase will support organizations like these, as well as numerous cold case foundations.   

 

Every project carries risk. Shipping and freight have been a big challenge over the last year for many companies but we are hopeful that by December things will be back up to speed. Murder & Co. is working hard to bring that risk down to a minimum by placing our orders from our product partners 60 days before our shipping due date, in order to deliver on schedule. We are far enough along in our development stages now that we can accurately determine when our game will go to print. We will keep our backers informed every step of the way, and if there is any chance of delay, we will communicate it immediately and with full transparency. We certainly wouldn't want to leave you dead in the water.

story:
In the beginning, the Gods created the world, and there were many wonders for them to see.  One of these wonders were the Giants who ruled with an iron fist. 

Iron Wolf Art has created the first in the series of Lands of Giants

The funding required for creating our miniature Giants goes towards the artwork created in the concept stage, the 3d modeling of the miniatures based on our concept art, several prototypes to verify the miniatures look good, the actual manufacturing of the miniatures, and then finally to prepare them for sending out! We’ve been working on the design and concept stage for these miniatures for several months now. And they are ready for release, all files are ready for download for home printing.

"Taken from folklore"

The Father of the Giants - the first giant created by the Gods.

Began a battle over the golden mountains with the master of red dragons.

They fought for three days and three nights. 

The battle was interrupted by Perun, the mighty god of lightning, the lord of the lower sky. Perun did not want the giants and dragons to kill each other so he stopped the fight.

As the giants trample on the warrior's word and break the rules of the megdan, Perun decided to punish them. He cast a curse on the giants to be ugly and grotesque forever and never to be trusted with a given word again. To live without honor forever. He presented the golden mountains to the dragons, and the giants were driven away.

 

 

Most of the miniatures shown in this campaign are not only designed and sculpted, but also in production and sometimes even manufactured. Pretty much all that is left is finishing up the production of all the unlockable extras from this campaign, and for that, we need your help.

We are aware that production problems can appear down the line, as well as logistics problems and a plethora of other risks. We have contingency plans in place to deal with those when and if they come, and we pledge to you to be transparent in our communication: if anything goes wrong, you will be the first to know.

However, we have done our best to ensure the overall risk is minimal and we will continue to do so until this project is finished and your rewards are delivered to your doorsteps.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
***NEWS FLASH***

I'm aware of an issue with the page loading times. It seems to be taking a long time to load the pages through the checkout process. It will load, but it just takes more time due to a mixture of demand and complexity. Please be patient and allow it to load, do not refresh the pages as you go through it.

For anyone who is having issues with making payments, they have given this link to the help page specific to payment issues here. You can also always contact me too, here.

I will keep this page updated. Apologies for any inconvenience these issues have caused, i'm just as frustrated by them. Cheers, Duncan.

I’m old school, and I’m happy to admit this. Back in the early 1990’s, I was first introduced to our favourite fantasy football game; back when the internet, mobile phones, and plastic miniatures where a thing of the future. When, therefore, I was lucky enough to save up enough pocket money or pester my parents hard enough, I would be able to buy a new shiny metal team to play badly with my friends. 

These days, most miniatures are plastic or resin, and I’m totally fine with this. The details, and the ability to convert and kitbash these miniatures is fantastic. But a part of me longs for the cool and weighty feel of a metal miniature and the small chance of lead poisoning from licking too many paint brushes!

It is this longing for a weighty feel to my modern miniatures which has driven me to design and develop this new and unique project. Not only do these products produce a satisfying weighty feel, they also give a premium look to one of the most overlooked aspects of finishing your miniatures. Read on to find out more about this project, I hope you like it.

These heavy metal bases give you total customisation control over your order. Ordered as Race Specific Perks you can specify three main areas of choice:

1. Base Finish.

These metal bases come in six distinct finishes. Antique Silver, Antique Bronze, Antique Gold, Metallic Black, Classic Black and Shiny Gold. Antique Silver, Antique Bronze, and Antique Gold give an old and used feel and, because they are quite natural in colour, they can really help your miniatures stand out. Classic Black is a deep black with a satin finish, not too glossy and not to matte. This variant gives a very familiar feel to those of us who like to finish our miniatures with the classic black base; simple and elegant. Metallic Black is a high gloss variant and looks to be a more of a very dark grey, almost like a gun metal and gives a very 'Beskar' feel.

2. Colour Rings.

In addition to the finish of the metal, you can also choose (or not) to install a single colour ring into each base. This ring is designed to do one of two things:

  1. Identify the ‘positional’ aspect of your miniature. It’s a popular way to help identify your miniatures while in play, such as red of blitzer, yellow for catcher and so on.
  2. If you are not interested in highlighting the positional nature of your miniature, then perhaps pick a colour that matches your teams kit colour, to really give it a premium and finished look. Perhaps you don’t want any colours at all? This is not a problem, simply select ‘none’ and you’ll receive yours without colour.

3. Base Sizes and Details.

The three types of bases available are designed for 25mm, 32mm and 40mm miniatures. On the underside of each base is an indicator for prone and stunned statuses. When you install your miniature to the base, you can set it up to help indicate the status of the miniature when placed down on the pitch.

 Another perk of using these metal bases is that top heavy miniatures that are prone to falling over are now less likely to do so.

The 25mm and 32mm base also fit perfectly with my previous Ball Carrier Tokens.

Star Player packs come with a choice of size for each base. The team packs come with choices of base size for miniatures that I believe need a choice; 'big guy' positions for example.

Detailed below are some example setups I have made to give you an overview of the possibilities available. As mentioned previously, you can customise your order to the exact personal requirements. Either using the colour rings to denote positions of the players, or perhaps to highlight a colour that is already used in the paint job you have, or plan to produce for your team. You can also opt to order your bases without any colour fill at all - the choice is yours every step of the way.

 

Like most things in this hobby of ours, there are many ways to achieve what we want. Some of you may want to retrofit/upgrade these bases into your existing miniatures, and some will build a new team with these in mind. I plan to produce a set of detailed instructions (and perhaps videos) for you all as part of each pledge. A printed booklet maybe? Below is a very brief overview of how you might want to install these bases.

New Team Installation

Installing these metal bases to a new team presents multiple ways of achieving the same result. This way probably depends more on what you are used to doing with your miniatures than anything else.

1. Pre Painting. This way involves attaching the miniature to the base before painting it. This gives you an opportunity to create a good solid bond and allows you to add basing materials, such as sand, to create mud etc. To keep the base clear of any paint during the painting process I would highly recommend masking off the base with masking tape, or whatever your preferred method.

2. After Painting. This way you would paint your miniature before installing it to the base. This way means no need to mask off the base, like the above option recommends. Once the miniature is installed you would then just need to finish the basing by gluing in the sand and static grass etc.

All the metal bases have a recessed area (0.75mm) across the top of the base, by design. This creates a barrier so that, when you are applying the glue for the sand and static grass, it stops it from overflowing into the positional colour ring area. It also means that the miniature has an area for the feet to grab onto because this area has a sandblasted texture. Glues love these areas and it helps produce a very tight bond.

You can also choose to install the base with edge-to-edge basing. See the picture above to see how this works. It will give you that classic look that we are all used to.

Retro Installation

Carefully clipping out your old base, you can then clean up their feet to create a new surface for gluing. I recommend you scuff the base of the feet to help create a good bonding surface. Once you have freed your miniature from your old base you can do one of two things: 

1. Glue the miniature to the new base (taking care to line-up for Prone/Stunned) and then add the basing details after, such as mud/sand and static grass etc.

2. Produce your base first, so before you stick the miniature to the base, you can glue in the sand and static grass. Once this is done, you simply glue the miniature as the last step.

During the testing on the prototypes I produced, I found that option 1 works really well. You have a clean metal surface for your glue to take a good hold of your miniature. I then filled the textured basing area with glue, then poured over the sand to create the mud texture. This gave me lots of control and make the miniature sit perfectly and formed a very strong bond. Then it was just a case of waiting for it to dry, and then finishing the base painting as you would any other miniature. 

Once you have selected and customised your first base pack from the homepage, you then have the option to not only include some of the amazing previous products you'll see below, but also to include additional base packs at a discounted price. All team races are available and include the ability to customise them to your own personal preference. All additional add ons do not incur any additional shipping costs; a great opportunity to make huge savings!

Add-on perks can be purchased at the checkout when you complete your order. They do not require any additional shipping costs (apart from Human Team Tokens, Space Hulk and Hero Quest) and are highly discounted; a perfect time to make savings and pickup items you may have missed out on previously.

The ball. For some of us it’s the be-all and end-all of the game. For others it simply gets in the way of a good punch-up. Nevertheless, it’s important that we know where the ball is at any given point in the match. This token has been designed to fit easily around your player's base, be that 25mm or 32mm in size. Moreover, with its cunningly designed shape, it fits snugly into the most crowded of cages or scraps. If the ball is loose on the pitch, simply flip the token to indicate it's up for grabs. Never again will you forget who’s holding the ball (and scrag them).

Produced in a Metallic Black finish with punchy enamel fill colours for clarity and is compatible with both 32mm and 25mm miniature bases and has a built in scatter template.

Bribery! Such a wonderful thing. If you have deep enough pockets you can really gain an advantage with these. Foul to your heart's content safe in the knowledge that you can just pay off the referee should they have the temerity to try to enforce the rules.

Be careful though as referees can be greedy, and you may need more than one to convince them to look the other way. So spend these valuable coins wisely.

You can track your spending by turning each one over after use. The bloody tears on the reverse side of each coin will be a dead giveaway as to its status.

Try not to roll too many ones…

Produced in antique gold plating and coloured enamel.

Nobody, and I mean NOBODY, bribes as hard as goblins do. They are masters at it. Which is just as well as they're terrible at everything else! They work hard to subvert the rules, so much so that the little buggers stole the original bribe coin die stamps and produced their own versions, with some very dubious amendments! They have even tried to dodge showing if they have used them at all - very sneaky stuff - the gits!

Never fear though, because the bloody tears reverse side always gives away the status of the bribe.

Produced in antique bronze plating and coloured enamel.

A beautiful translucent D16 in blood red with white infill colour icons, and a 16mm D6 in bright white with blood red colour infill. This D16 is a custom-made dice, and the icons will be part of the dice mould. This means no laser engraving is required; just crystal-clear designs with solid colour fill.

The dice that started it all! Now referred to as Legacy Casualty Dice and can be used with all rules prior to the 2020 release. Two dice, one 6-sided engraved 16mm opaque white die and the other an 8-sided engraved red die. 

The dice design shows clearly what the result is. No fumbling about getting the two numbers mixed up etc. The dice show you the result instantly. Should you require more information detailing the seriousness of the injury, you will be able to reference the handy, high quality reference card included with each set of dice.

Being the coach of a fantasy football team is a difficult and frequently violently curtailed career choice. Some are better than others at dealing with the stresses of coaching a team, prowling the sidelines, barking orders and questioning the calls and parentage of the referee. Sometimes they go a little too far…

Assuming all is well, this coach coin shows your head coach where they belong; in the dugout. Should they go too far and have to be removed from the game just for politely suggesting at knifepoint that the ref lets their poor little chainsaw back on the pitch then simply turn this coin over to show your coach has left the dugout.

With any luck, they'll recover from their 'security escort' in time for the next match…

Produced in antique silver plating and coloured enamel.

Every game of fantasy football starts with a kick-off. The referee flips the coin after a coach has picked a side. Heads or Tentacles? There are even myths about coaches rolling dice to see who kicks and receives.

Well, no more! I’m very proud of this coin, confident that it is at least the equal of any fantasy football community produced coin in existence. A quality item for a momentous choice - kick or receive?

Produced in antique silver plating.

HOW TO ORDER THESE NEGATRAIT BANDS AS PART OF YOUR PLEDGE:

1. Make your pledge here on this Indiegogo page as per normal.

2. Go to the Charlie Victor Store Page here.

3. Add any of the Block Dice, Negatrait Bands, Charlie Victor Dice to your basket.

4. Checkout using the code ‘HEAVYMETAL’ which applies free shipping.

5. Relax.

When the indiegogo campaign comes to an end, and I'm ready to ship your pledges, I will then collate the orders and ship you your add ons as one package. I have to do it this way for these three items as a way of keeping an accurate stock level.

These Negatrait Marker Bands have been designed with the miniature in mind; a soft, durable ring that will not damage your paint job (assuming you have one!). Let’s just hope you don’t have to use it them very much. Made from durable silicone complete with punchy colours, these bands will pretty much fit anything you throw them on.

HOW TO ORDER THESE BLOCK DICE AS PART OF YOUR PLEDGE:

1. Make your pledge here on this Indiegogo page as per normal.

2. Go to the Charlie Victor Store Page here.

3. Add any of the Block Dice, Negatrait Bands, Charlie Victor Dice to your basket.

4. Checkout using the code ‘HEAVYMETAL’ which applies free shipping.

5. Relax.

When the indiegogo campaign comes to an end, and I'm ready to ship your pledges, I will then collate the orders and ship you your add ons as one package. I have to do it this way for these three items as a way of keeping an accurate stock level.

Charlie Victor is proud to present these beautiful 16mm Block Dice. Ten colours and finishes to select from, all with crystal clear impactful icons. Sold as a SET OF THREE dice, these premium quality dice can be part of your collection today.

HOW TO ORDER THESE CHARLIE VICTOR DICE AS PART OF YOUR PLEDGE:

1. Make your pledge here on this Indiegogo page as per normal.

2. Go to the Charlie Victor Store Page here.

3. Add any of the Block Dice, Negatrait Bands, Charlie Victor Dice to your basket.

4. Checkout using the code ‘HEAVYMETAL’ which applies free shipping.

5. Relax.

When the indiegogo campaign comes to an end, and I'm ready to ship your pledges, I will then collate the orders and ship you your add ons as one package. I have to do it this way for these three items as a way of keeping an accurate stock level.

Charlie Victor is proud to present this beautiful 16mm D6 dice selection. A limited run of four different dice with the Charlie Victor stamp installed onto the one side. I love dice and I wanted to have a special set out there for all you dice fans out there. Sold as a set of two dice, these guys can be part of your collection today and are available in four variants:

To help you understand what is included in this pack a glance, here is a quick summary.

Team Icon Token
Kicked Token
Received Token
Score Token
x3 Unique Re-Roll Tokens
Ogre Bonehead Band
Ogre Stunned/Prone Token
FAME Token
Team Apothecary Token
Ball Carrier Token
32mm Coach Miniature (in Resin or Metal)
Wizard Token
Kegs Token (with built in bottle opener)
Human Team Patch
Team Dice (x2 D6)
Team Block Dice (x3 D6)
Dice Cup
Dice Mat
Dice & Token Bag
Charlie Victor Backer Patch

That’s a total of 22 incredibly unique items coming your way. If you wish to see these items in more detail, then please visit the Charlie Victor Store page. After this runs out of stock, there will never again be a reproduction, so if you want to be part of history, do not miss out!

A High-Quality Embroidered Patch for the 'CAS' - the Casualty Appreciation Society! This patch is produced to a high standard and comes with an iron-on material on the reverse. I plan to slap mine onto my favourite shirt and show the world just how much I like to kick ass!

A High-Quality Embroidered Patch for the 'FAS' - the Foul Appreciation Society! This patch is produced to a high standard and comes with an iron-on material on the reverse. I plan to slap mine onto my favourite shirt and show the world just how “foul” I am!

This Official Charlie Victor Patch comes free as part of the Humans Team Tokens Pack, and was a free gift for all those who supported that campaign or purchase the tokens from this website.

Now available to purchase individually for the first time, you can own this patch and by doing so you support Charlie Victor Products directly. This is a big deal to me, and anyone I see wearing this will be lovingly considered a brother and earn themselves a firm handshake.

Comes complete with iron on backing and is 70mm x 45mm in size.

This new range of products are inspired by some of the most iconic and classic film and tv of our age and pay homage to the brands and graphics that appear within them. Produced to the usual premium standards you’ve come to expect from Charlie Victor. Keyrings are just the start, in the future I plan to produce more diverse merchandise. For more details on this range checkout the store page.

Keyring inspired by the 1986 classic ‘Aliens’ by James Cameron, this keyring details the UA 571-C Sentry Guns HUD used to defend the Colonial Marines position within Hadley's Hope on LV-426. C & D guns were the last defence against the Aliens, covering a corridor intersection. Originally cut from the theatrical release of the movie but included in the Special Edition, it makes for one hell of a scene.

This double-sided keyring reflects both guns in those scenes, and includes the accurate details of the rounds remaining, barrel temperatures and seconds of fire left on each weapon. Produced in Black Zinc Alloy with punchy enamel colour fill at 60mm x 30mm in size and weighing in at 61 grams.

Selecting a Perk and customising your metal bases could not be easier. Each Perk has a customisable selection process for each item contained within the Perk. Such as a section for the 0-16 Line Position, Blitzers and Big Guys etc. First, you get to select the metal finish (1). Then you choose to either add a colour ring or if you do not wish to add a colour ring you simply select ‘none’ (2). Once you have selected the options you have, you will notice that a little green tick (3) gets added next to the item. This process needs to be completed for all items within the perk.

On some perks you will also notice you get to select a base size (4). All bases are 32mm as standard, however whenever there is a ‘big guy’ or a positional I think needed a 40mm option, such as on an Ogre team, you can select whatever size you wish and think best fits your team. 

Once you have completed all option selections you will notice that all items now have a green tick next to them (5). Here you can also see in detail the options you have selected for each item. Please be sure to double check your selections here before you move on (6).

After double checking your perks selection and customisation, you can now add on (if you wish too) more Team Base Perks and/or the available heavily discounted add-ons (7).

If you add on Team Base Perks here you will be presented with the same customisation options detailed above, making sure you always get to make the orders to your own specifications. Once you are happy you can now proceed to checkout and complete your order.

Here is the full list of available add-ons, team base perks and star player base perks:

Coach Coin
Kick-Off Coin
Legacy Casualty Dice + Apoc Cards
2020 Casualty Dice + Apoc Cards
Casualty Appreciation Society Patch (CAS)
Negatrait Bone Head Band (x1)
Negatrait Animal Savagery Band (x1)
Negatrait Really Stupid Band (x1)
Negatrait Take Root Band (x1)
Bribe Coins (x3) + FAS Patch
Goblin Bribe Coins (x3) + FAS Patch
Foul Appreciation Society Patch (FAS)
Complete Human Team Tokens Pack (22 items)
Black Edition Ball Carrier Token
Charlie Victor Block Dice
Charlie Victor Dice
Charlie Victor Patch
UA 571-C Sentry Gun Keyring (Hollywood Range)

Team Base Perks (ALL DISCOUNTED TO £15)

Black Orc
Chaos Chosen
Chaos Renegade
Dark Elves
Dwarf
Elven Union
Goblin
Halfling
Human
Imperial Noblity
Lizardmen
Necromantic Horror
Nurgle
Ogre
Old World Alliance

Charlie Victor Products was formed in 2014 by me, Duncan Holman, and brought together my personal, creative and professional passions under one roof. It’s through Charlie Victor that I engage with the local, domestic and international tabletop Fantasy Football family and the wargaming community. Everything I make is for the fans of the game we play; nothing gives me greater pleasure than seeing my products on the pitch and across the table.

I’m 41, a self-employed designer with 23+ years of design industry experience, living in Leicester, UK with my wife, Elen, and our two young children, Sasha and Nikita. I love to eat good food, watch good films, see good friends, and roll terrible sequences of dice.

In 2015 I founded the Leicester Blood Bowl League (LBBL) and served proudly as Commissioner for five seasons. Like Charlie Victor itself, it was born from a desire to bring together like-minded folk and make the hobby bigger, better and bloodier! After handing over the reins in 2018, Charlie Victor has launched four successful Indiegogo campaigns and firmly established itself within the Fantasy Football community.

One of the highlights of the LBBL was designing high-quality ‘loot’ for each coach completing a season: from dice to dog tags, poker chips to bribe coins. As with every Charlie Victor product, the quality, playability, and desirability of these items was paramount, and they quickly became both club favourites and highly sought after by collectors.

Ultimately, I just love to design cool, and I want the whole hobby to be enhanced as a, my goals remain the same: to have fun, make cool stuff, and grow the hobby.

As a design fanatic, I like to think I have a feel for what good design should look like and how it should perform. This led me to launch my first Indiegogo campaign for my Casualty Dice which successfully funded in under 24hrs and went on to raise 946% of the original goal. Click the image to see the full details on its project page:

My next crowdfunded project was the highly successful Coins of Corruption. This project celebrated the darker side of the game of fantasy football, funding was achieved in under just 2hrs and went on to raise £8,965.00 - 326% of its original goal. To say I was pleased with how the community responded to this untested concept would be a huge understatement and I would like to take this opportunity to thank everyone who backed the project, including those who purchased the limited remaining items after the project had been delivered to backers. Click the image to see the full details on its project page:

My third crowdfunded project was the most successful to date - Human Team Tokens. The aim of that campaign was to produce stunning and unique items for human teams found in the fantasy football universe. Funding was achieved in under only 7 minutes and went on to raise £16,007 - 400% of its original goal and unlocking every stretch goal. As with all of my projects to date, they are untested concepts within the community, and I was incredibly humbled that so many backers came forward to help me fund the vision and concept of race specific team tokens. More of these team tokens will be launched in future, so please keep your eyes peeled for it!

My fourth project was a direct result of new rules coming into the community and required a complete redesign of the Casualty Dice. Switching from a D6/D8 to a D6/D16 was a big jump and the community came forward to help me launch this Indiegogo campaign for my Casualty Dice 2020, which successfully funded in under only 20 minutes and went on to raise £7,055 - 587% of it's original goal. Click the image to see the full details on its project page:

I just love to design cool stuff, no matter how small or large the idea. I get a real kick out of seeing people using products I have created, and this is where I hope you, the community can come in and help my vision for this metal base system to become a reality.

If you have backed any of my projects previously you will know that I’m fanatical about only producing premium quality items. This is reflected in what you received as a backer, and that quality WILL be provided again in this, and future Charlie Victor projects.

This project does not aim to break any technological bounds, nor does it pretend to be anything other than an opportunity for me to bring my design ideas to life, and for you in the community to have fun with them. It’s in my nature to share and I very much want to share this with you.

I’m deliberately using die casting and enamels because, despite it being more expensive, it’s by far the best quality finish and has an increased longevity over any other type of production process.

I’d like to be honest and upfront that there ‘may’ be changes to items in the campaign after it’s finished. This will ONLY ever be for improving the design and atheistic, never to make anything cheaper or easier for me. If you know me well enough you will know I’m a bit of a fanatic and I’m only interested in making the items the best they can be. I hope you can put your trust in me to deliver the very best items and come aboard and back the campaign and make it a reality.

Please also refer to the FAQs for this campaign. I have filled it with typical questions and answers, some of which may answer your queries. If you have a question not covered by the FAQs, don’t hesitate to get in touch as I’ll be happy to help you.

I like to think I’m a trusted member of the fantasy football community and I value that trust immensely. I responsibly managed the finances of the previous campaigns I produced and delivered to thousands of backers around the world. I have produced these types of products in the past, so I’m very confident in completing this campaign to the high standard you’ve come to expect from me and my brand. I think the point I’m trying to make is you can trust in me to deliver this project to you; my reputation depends on it.

There aren’t any challenges that haven’t already been overcome. I have the production moulds completed, and I’m using a trusted supplier that can produce the quantities I need. I’ve completed these projects previously and understand the challenges of shipping products across the world. I’m 100% confident that I’m equipped to deliver this project. 

I aim to start shipping to backers in September 2021, or earlier if possible.

Please consider backing this campaign and if you do choose to do so, please also consider spreading the word to as many people as you can – this is critical to a successful campaign. After previous campaigns have closed, I had many people message me wanting to purchase the campaign's perks. It’s great to have these people come forward, but even better if they back the campaign in the first instance as this helps unlock more stretch goals. If, however, you choose not to back this campaign then please feel free to let me know why. Feedback, good or bad, is important to me. This support would be very much appreciated and could make all the difference in the future.

Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign, and I hope you choose to help me succeed in this passion project of mine. Should you have any questions please do not hesitate to ask; I'll be ready and waiting to answer them.

Cheers!
Duncan

***NEWS FLASH***I'm aware of an issue with the page loading times. It seems to be taking a long time to load the pages through the checkout process. It will load, but it just takes more time due to a mixture of demand and complexity. Please be patient and allow it to load, do not refresh the pages as you go through it.For anyone who is having issues with making payments, they have given this link to the help page specific to payment issues here. You can also always contact me too, here.I will keep this page updated. Apologies for any inconvenience these issues have caused, i'm just as frustrated by them. Cheers, Duncan.I’m old school, and I’m happy to admit this. Back in the early 1990’s, I was first introduced to our favourite fantasy football game; back when the internet, mobile phones, and plastic miniatures where a thing of the future. When, therefore, I was lucky enough to save up enough pocket money or pester my parents hard enough, I would be able to buy a new shiny metal team to play badly with my friends. These days, most miniatures are plastic or resin, and I’m totally fine with this. The details, and the ability to convert and kitbash these miniatures is fantastic. But a part of me longs for the cool and weighty feel of a metal miniature and the small chance of lead poisoning from licking too many paint brushes!It is this longing for a weighty feel to my modern miniatures which has driven me to design and develop this new and unique project. Not only do these products produce a satisfying weighty feel, they also give a premium look to one of the most overlooked aspects of finishing your miniatures. Read on to find out more about this project, I hope you like it.These heavy metal bases give you total customisation control over your order. Ordered as Race Specific Perks you can specify three main areas of choice:1. Base Finish.These metal bases come in six distinct finishes. Antique Silver, Antique Bronze, Antique Gold, Metallic Black, Classic Black and Shiny Gold. Antique Silver, Antique Bronze, and Antique Gold give an old and used feel and, because they are quite natural in colour, they can really help your miniatures stand out. Classic Black is a deep black with a satin finish, not too glossy and not to matte. This variant gives a very familiar feel to those of us who like to finish our miniatures with the classic black base; simple and elegant. Metallic Black is a high gloss variant and looks to be a more of a very dark grey, almost like a gun metal and gives a very 'Beskar' feel.2. Colour Rings.In addition to the finish of the metal, you can also choose (or not) to install a single colour ring into each base. This ring is designed to do one of two things:
Identify the ‘positional’ aspect of your miniature. It’s a popular way to help identify your miniatures while in play, such as red of blitzer, yellow for catcher and so on.
If you are not interested in highlighting the positional nature of your miniature, then perhaps pick a colour that matches your teams kit colour, to really give it a premium and finished look. Perhaps you don’t want any colours at all? This is not a problem, simply select ‘none’ and you’ll receive yours without colour.
3. Base Sizes and Details.The three types of bases available are designed for 25mm, 32mm and 40mm miniatures. On the underside of each base is an indicator for prone and stunned statuses. When you install your miniature to the base, you can set it up to help indicate the status of the miniature when placed down on the pitch. Another perk of using these metal bases is that top heavy miniatures that are prone to falling over are now less likely to do so.The 25mm and 32mm base also fit perfectly with my previous Ball Carrier Tokens.Star Player packs come with a choice of size for each base. The team packs come with choices of base size for miniatures that I believe need a choice; 'big guy' positions for example.Detailed below are some example setups I have made to give you an overview of the possibilities available. As mentioned previously, you can customise your order to the exact personal requirements. Either using the colour rings to denote positions of the players, or perhaps to highlight a colour that is already used in the paint job you have, or plan to produce for your team. You can also opt to order your bases without any colour fill at all - the choice is yours every step of the way. Like most things in this hobby of ours, there are many ways to achieve what we want. Some of you may want to retrofit/upgrade these bases into your existing miniatures, and some will build a new team with these in mind. I plan to produce a set of detailed instructions (and perhaps videos) for you all as part of each pledge. A printed booklet maybe? Below is a very brief overview of how you might want to install these bases.New Team InstallationInstalling these metal bases to a new team presents multiple ways of achieving the same result. This way probably depends more on what you are used to doing with your miniatures than anything else.1. Pre Painting. This way involves attaching the miniature to the base before painting it. This gives you an opportunity to create a good solid bond and allows you to add basing materials, such as sand, to create mud etc. To keep the base clear of any paint during the painting process I would highly recommend masking off the base with masking tape, or whatever your preferred method.2. After Painting. This way you would paint your miniature before installing it to the base. This way means no need to mask off the base, like the above option recommends. Once the miniature is installed you would then just need to finish the basing by gluing in the sand and static grass etc.All the metal bases have a recessed area (0.75mm) across the top of the base, by design. This creates a barrier so that, when you are applying the glue for the sand and static grass, it stops it from overflowing into the positional colour ring area. It also means that the miniature has an area for the feet to grab onto because this area has a sandblasted texture. Glues love these areas and it helps produce a very tight bond.You can also choose to install the base with edge-to-edge basing. See the picture above to see how this works. It will give you that classic look that we are all used to.Retro InstallationCarefully clipping out your old base, you can then clean up their feet to create a new surface for gluing. I recommend you scuff the base of the feet to help create a good bonding surface. Once you have freed your miniature from your old base you can do one of two things: 1. Glue the miniature to the new base (taking care to line-up for Prone/Stunned) and then add the basing details after, such as mud/sand and static grass etc.2. Produce your base first, so before you stick the miniature to the base, you can glue in the sand and static grass. Once this is done, you simply glue the miniature as the last step.During the testing on the prototypes I produced, I found that option 1 works really well. You have a clean metal surface for your glue to take a good hold of your miniature. I then filled the textured basing area with glue, then poured over the sand to create the mud texture. This gave me lots of control and make the miniature sit perfectly and formed a very strong bond. Then it was just a case of waiting for it to dry, and then finishing the base painting as you would any other miniature. Once you have selected and customised your first base pack from the homepage, you then have the option to not only include some of the amazing previous products you'll see below, but also to include additional base packs at a discounted price. All team races are available and include the ability to customise them to your own personal preference. All additional add ons do not incur any additional shipping costs; a great opportunity to make huge savings!Add-on perks can be purchased at the checkout when you complete your order. They do not require any additional shipping costs (apart from Human Team Tokens, Space Hulk and Hero Quest) and are highly discounted; a perfect time to make savings and pickup items you may have missed out on previously.The ball. For some of us it’s the be-all and end-all of the game. For others it simply gets in the way of a good punch-up. Nevertheless, it’s important that we know where the ball is at any given point in the match. This token has been designed to fit easily around your player's base, be that 25mm or 32mm in size. Moreover, with its cunningly designed shape, it fits snugly into the most crowded of cages or scraps. If the ball is loose on the pitch, simply flip the token to indicate it's up for grabs. Never again will you forget who’s holding the ball (and scrag them).Produced in a Metallic Black finish with punchy enamel fill colours for clarity and is compatible with both 32mm and 25mm miniature bases and has a built in scatter template.Bribery! Such a wonderful thing. If you have deep enough pockets you can really gain an advantage with these. Foul to your heart's content safe in the knowledge that you can just pay off the referee should they have the temerity to try to enforce the rules.Be careful though as referees can be greedy, and you may need more than one to convince them to look the other way. So spend these valuable coins wisely.You can track your spending by turning each one over after use. The bloody tears on the reverse side of each coin will be a dead giveaway as to its status.Try not to roll too many ones…Produced in antique gold plating and coloured enamel.Nobody, and I mean NOBODY, bribes as hard as goblins do. They are masters at it. Which is just as well as they're terrible at everything else! They work hard to subvert the rules, so much so that the little buggers stole the original bribe coin die stamps and produced their own versions, with some very dubious amendments! They have even tried to dodge showing if they have used them at all - very sneaky stuff - the gits!Never fear though, because the bloody tears reverse side always gives away the status of the bribe.Produced in antique bronze plating and coloured enamel.A beautiful translucent D16 in blood red with white infill colour icons, and a 16mm D6 in bright white with blood red colour infill. This D16 is a custom-made dice, and the icons will be part of the dice mould. This means no laser engraving is required; just crystal-clear designs with solid colour fill.The dice that started it all! Now referred to as Legacy Casualty Dice and can be used with all rules prior to the 2020 release. Two dice, one 6-sided engraved 16mm opaque white die and the other an 8-sided engraved red die. The dice design shows clearly what the result is. No fumbling about getting the two numbers mixed up etc. The dice show you the result instantly. Should you require more information detailing the seriousness of the injury, you will be able to reference the handy, high quality reference card included with each set of dice.Being the coach of a fantasy football team is a difficult and frequently violently curtailed career choice. Some are better than others at dealing with the stresses of coaching a team, prowling the sidelines, barking orders and questioning the calls and parentage of the referee. Sometimes they go a little too far…Assuming all is well, this coach coin shows your head coach where they belong; in the dugout. Should they go too far and have to be removed from the game just for politely suggesting at knifepoint that the ref lets their poor little chainsaw back on the pitch then simply turn this coin over to show your coach has left the dugout.With any luck, they'll recover from their 'security escort' in time for the next match…Produced in antique silver plating and coloured enamel.Every game of fantasy football starts with a kick-off. The referee flips the coin after a coach has picked a side. Heads or Tentacles? There are even myths about coaches rolling dice to see who kicks and receives.Well, no more! I’m very proud of this coin, confident that it is at least the equal of any fantasy football community produced coin in existence. A quality item for a momentous choice - kick or receive?Produced in antique silver plating.HOW TO ORDER THESE NEGATRAIT BANDS AS PART OF YOUR PLEDGE:1. Make your pledge here on this Indiegogo page as per normal.2. Go to the Charlie Victor Store Page here.3. Add any of the Block Dice, Negatrait Bands, Charlie Victor Dice to your basket.4. Checkout using the code ‘HEAVYMETAL’ which applies free shipping.5. Relax.When the indiegogo campaign comes to an end, and I'm ready to ship your pledges, I will then collate the orders and ship you your add ons as one package. I have to do it this way for these three items as a way of keeping an accurate stock level.These Negatrait Marker Bands have been designed with the miniature in mind; a soft, durable ring that will not damage your paint job (assuming you have one!). Let’s just hope you don’t have to use it them very much. Made from durable silicone complete with punchy colours, these bands will pretty much fit anything you throw them on.HOW TO ORDER THESE BLOCK DICE AS PART OF YOUR PLEDGE:1. Make your pledge here on this Indiegogo page as per normal.2. Go to the Charlie Victor Store Page here.3. Add any of the Block Dice, Negatrait Bands, Charlie Victor Dice to your basket.4. Checkout using the code ‘HEAVYMETAL’ which applies free shipping.5. Relax.When the indiegogo campaign comes to an end, and I'm ready to ship your pledges, I will then collate the orders and ship you your add ons as one package. I have to do it this way for these three items as a way of keeping an accurate stock level.Charlie Victor is proud to present these beautiful 16mm Block Dice. Ten colours and finishes to select from, all with crystal clear impactful icons. Sold as a SET OF THREE dice, these premium quality dice can be part of your collection today.HOW TO ORDER THESE CHARLIE VICTOR DICE AS PART OF YOUR PLEDGE:1. Make your pledge here on this Indiegogo page as per normal.2. Go to the Charlie Victor Store Page here.3. Add any of the Block Dice, Negatrait Bands, Charlie Victor Dice to your basket.4. Checkout using the code ‘HEAVYMETAL’ which applies free shipping.5. Relax.When the indiegogo campaign comes to an end, and I'm ready to ship your pledges, I will then collate the orders and ship you your add ons as one package. I have to do it this way for these three items as a way of keeping an accurate stock level.Charlie Victor is proud to present this beautiful 16mm D6 dice selection. A limited run of four different dice with the Charlie Victor stamp installed onto the one side. I love dice and I wanted to have a special set out there for all you dice fans out there. Sold as a set of two dice, these guys can be part of your collection today and are available in four variants:To help you understand what is included in this pack a glance, here is a quick summary.Team Icon TokenKicked TokenReceived TokenScore Tokenx3 Unique Re-Roll TokensOgre Bonehead BandOgre Stunned/Prone TokenFAME TokenTeam Apothecary TokenBall Carrier Token32mm Coach Miniature (in Resin or Metal)Wizard TokenKegs Token (with built in bottle opener)Human Team PatchTeam Dice (x2 D6)Team Block Dice (x3 D6)Dice CupDice MatDice & Token BagCharlie Victor Backer PatchThat’s a total of 22 incredibly unique items coming your way. If you wish to see these items in more detail, then please visit the Charlie Victor Store page. After this runs out of stock, there will never again be a reproduction, so if you want to be part of history, do not miss out!A High-Quality Embroidered Patch for the 'CAS' - the Casualty Appreciation Society! This patch is produced to a high standard and comes with an iron-on material on the reverse. I plan to slap mine onto my favourite shirt and show the world just how much I like to kick ass!A High-Quality Embroidered Patch for the 'FAS' - the Foul Appreciation Society! This patch is produced to a high standard and comes with an iron-on material on the reverse. I plan to slap mine onto my favourite shirt and show the world just how “foul” I am!This Official Charlie Victor Patch comes free as part of the Humans Team Tokens Pack, and was a free gift for all those who supported that campaign or purchase the tokens from this website.Now available to purchase individually for the first time, you can own this patch and by doing so you support Charlie Victor Products directly. This is a big deal to me, and anyone I see wearing this will be lovingly considered a brother and earn themselves a firm handshake.Comes complete with iron on backing and is 70mm x 45mm in size.This new range of products are inspired by some of the most iconic and classic film and tv of our age and pay homage to the brands and graphics that appear within them. Produced to the usual premium standards you’ve come to expect from Charlie Victor. Keyrings are just the start, in the future I plan to produce more diverse merchandise. For more details on this range checkout the store page.Keyring inspired by the 1986 classic ‘Aliens’ by James Cameron, this keyring details the UA 571-C Sentry Guns HUD used to defend the Colonial Marines position within Hadley's Hope on LV-426. C & D guns were the last defence against the Aliens, covering a corridor intersection. Originally cut from the theatrical release of the movie but included in the Special Edition, it makes for one hell of a scene.This double-sided keyring reflects both guns in those scenes, and includes the accurate details of the rounds remaining, barrel temperatures and seconds of fire left on each weapon. Produced in Black Zinc Alloy with punchy enamel colour fill at 60mm x 30mm in size and weighing in at 61 grams.Selecting a Perk and customising your metal bases could not be easier. Each Perk has a customisable selection process for each item contained within the Perk. Such as a section for the 0-16 Line Position, Blitzers and Big Guys etc. First, you get to select the metal finish (1). Then you choose to either add a colour ring or if you do not wish to add a colour ring you simply select ‘none’ (2). Once you have selected the options you have, you will notice that a little green tick (3) gets added next to the item. This process needs to be completed for all items within the perk.On some perks you will also notice you get to select a base size (4). All bases are 32mm as standard, however whenever there is a ‘big guy’ or a positional I think needed a 40mm option, such as on an Ogre team, you can select whatever size you wish and think best fits your team. Once you have completed all option selections you will notice that all items now have a green tick next to them (5). Here you can also see in detail the options you have selected for each item. Please be sure to double check your selections here before you move on (6).After double checking your perks selection and customisation, you can now add on (if you wish too) more Team Base Perks and/or the available heavily discounted add-ons (7).If you add on Team Base Perks here you will be presented with the same customisation options detailed above, making sure you always get to make the orders to your own specifications. Once you are happy you can now proceed to checkout and complete your order.Here is the full list of available add-ons, team base perks and star player base perks:Coach CoinKick-Off CoinLegacy Casualty Dice + Apoc Cards2020 Casualty Dice + Apoc CardsCasualty Appreciation Society Patch (CAS)Negatrait Bone Head Band (x1)Negatrait Animal Savagery Band (x1)Negatrait Really Stupid Band (x1)Negatrait Take Root Band (x1)Bribe Coins (x3) + FAS PatchGoblin Bribe Coins (x3) + FAS PatchFoul Appreciation Society Patch (FAS)Complete Human Team Tokens Pack (22 items)Black Edition Ball Carrier TokenCharlie Victor Block DiceCharlie Victor DiceCharlie Victor PatchUA 571-C Sentry Gun Keyring (Hollywood Range)Team Base Perks (ALL DISCOUNTED TO £15)Black OrcChaos ChosenChaos RenegadeDark ElvesDwarfElven UnionGoblinHalflingHumanImperial NoblityLizardmenNecromantic HorrorNurgleOgreOld World AllianceOrcShambling UndeadSkavenSnotling TeamUnderworld DenizensWood ElfAmazon (ToL)Chaos Dwarf (ToL)Bretonnian (ToL)Daemons of Khorne (ToL)High Elf (ToL)Norse (ToL)Slann (ToL)Tomb Kings (ToL)Vampire (ToL)Star Player BasesStar Player Bases (x1)Star Player Bases (x2)Star Player Bases (x3)Star Player Bases (x4)Star Player Bases (x5)Star Player Bases (x6)Star Player Bases (x7)Star Player Bases (x8)Star Player Bases (x9)Star Player Bases (x10)Other Game SystemsSpace Hulk Bases (x35)Hero Quest Bases (x35)Charlie Victor Products was formed in 2014 by me, Duncan Holman, and brought together my personal, creative and professional passions under one roof. It’s in my nature to share and I very much want to share this with you.I’m deliberately using die casting and enamels because, despite it being more expensive, it’s by far the best quality finish and has an increased longevity over any other type of production process.I’d like to be honest and upfront that there ‘may’ be changes to items in the campaign after it’s finished. This will ONLY ever be for improving the design and atheistic, never to make anything cheaper or easier for me. If you know me well enough you will know I’m a bit of a fanatic and I’m only interested in making the items the best they can be. I hope you can put your trust in me to deliver the very best items and come aboard and back the campaign and make it a reality.Please also refer to the FAQs for this campaign. I have filled it with typical questions and answers, some of which may answer your queries. If you have a question not covered by the FAQs, don’t hesitate to get in touch as I’ll be happy to help you.I like to think I’m a trusted member of the fantasy football community and I value that trust immensely. I responsibly managed the finances of the previous campaigns I produced and delivered to thousands of backers around the world. I have produced these types of products in the past, so I’m very confident in completing this campaign to the high standard you’ve come to expect from me and my brand. I think the point I’m trying to make is you can trust in me to deliver this project to you; my reputation depends on it.There aren’t any challenges that haven’t already been overcome. I have the production moulds completed, and I’m using a trusted supplier that can produce the quantities I need. I’ve completed these projects previously and understand the challenges of shipping products across the world. I’m 100% confident that I’m equipped to deliver this project. I aim to start shipping to backers in September 2021, or earlier if possible.Please consider backing this campaign and if you do choose to do so, please also consider spreading the word to as many people as you can – this is critical to a successful campaign. After previous campaigns have closed, I had many people message me wanting to purchase the campaign's perks. It’s great to have these people come forward, but even better if they back the campaign in the first instance as this helps unlock more stretch goals. If, however, you choose not to back this campaign then please feel free to let me know why. Feedback, good or bad, is important to me. This support would be very much appreciated and could make all the difference in the future.Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign, and I hope you choose to help me succeed in this passion project of mine. Should you have any questions please do not hesitate to ask; I'll be ready and waiting to answer them.Cheers!Duncan

story:
Stretch Goals

Taking reasonable suggestions, but otherwise looking to reach the target first, and additional funding will go on more, and more diverse, art.

  • £3,500: An introductory, pregen adventure set upon the night of the comet.
  • £4,000: An introductory, pregen adventure for your first day and night in the city.

£2,000,000 - PbtA conversion (because I hate PbtA) :-P

Completed Goals

WE ARE NOW GOING TO BE 100%

Project Summary

Hi!

I'm James Desborough, people call me 'Grim' (long story).

I'm a veteran of the RPG industry with over 20 years of experience, working for companies like Wizards of the Coast, Steve Jackson Games, Cubicle 7 Entertainment and more. I also run my own company, Postmortem Studios, where I publish my own material and help RPG artists and new designers to get their work out there.

Wightchester is an idea that has been percolating for several years, and I've been working on it in the background for some time. I've finally decided to get the project done, and as such I'm raising some money to help bring the project to the fullest possible fruition.

I want to try something a bit different here, a fully detailed and effective horror game, suited for low-fantasy. A setting where blades and gunpowder are more important than magic, and where the magic that does exist demands a price. Not a hex crawl, or a conventional adventure, but a free-roaming setting where you - the players - can decide what you want to do.

  • Do you want to try and escape?
  • Do you want to create a fortified place to live within the prison?
  • Do you want to clear the entire city of the undead and earn your release?

Good luck with any of those.

If you back this project you will help create a landmark book and setting, as grand as any mega-dungeon or city-state that has come before, but with a dark and foreboding edge of grimdark survival horror.

What We Need & What You Get

The book is already over half-written, with the general shape of the city spelt out and many of its locations already described.

What we need at this point is time, time to devote fully to finishing the book, commissioning extra art and cartography and running through editing and other passes to polish up the book as a whole.

  • £3,000 to cover previous work paid for and to cover the time spent to finish development.
  • Any further funds to go towards additional art and cartography.
  • Even if I don't reach my final goal, what funds are contributed will ensure a final product is produced, just not with the same amount of time or quality devoted to it as I would prefer.

Stretch goals will provide additional conversions of monsters and non-player-characters for additional systems such as Lamentations of the Flame Princess and Mork Borg. The base book will have rules for 5e D&D and my 'Grimdark' rules-set for the same.

Other stretch goals might include handouts, adventures, free Postmortem Studios material and more.

The Impact

This is, I think, a landmark project with an unprecedented level of detail to it. A landmark in more than one way, I think it will influence other settings and campaign books in the future, and you can be a part of it.

I have crowdfunded several projects in the past:

  • A regular scholarship program for underprivileged artists.
  • A history book.
  • Three RPG games.

I always deliver, even when problems arise and projects are delayed, with good communication and compensation where I feel it's necessary.

I want your help to add another, major, successful project to the list.

Risks & Challenges

No project is without risk, and we're not a large company. We've definitely had some issues with projects in the past, but we've always pulled through it to provide a product.

I do suffer from severe clinical depression, which comes and goes in severity, but can make my capacity for work severely lessened. I have factored this in, giving myself enough time to deliver, regardless.

I do have existing commitments that also eat into my time, running paid, streamed games online regularly. August is relatively free of that commitment and again has been factored in. I have cleared my desk of virtually all interruptions from this project (another reason I need the money to pay for the gap in production).

I have, in the past, had problems with bottlenecks from using a single artist, writer or other assistant professionals. This time I have been sure to include a variety of artists in the project, and the majority of the artwork is already complete.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can always share the project on social media, mention it in your videos or invite me onto your channel or podcast to help me promote the crowdfunder and talk about the project itself. Whatever I can do to help you help me, let me know.

This time I have been sure to include a variety of artists in the project, and the majority of the artwork is already complete.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute, you can always share the project on social media, mention it in your videos or invite me onto your channel or podcast to help me promote the crowdfunder and talk about the project itself. Whatever I can do to help you help me, let me know.

story:
The Folio: Black Label series are fantasy adventure modules that are compatible with BOTH classic Advanced Dungeons & Dragons and 5th Edition D&D formats.  Each adventure combines what I enjoyed most from the heady days of of the late 1970s and the 1980s swords & sorcery storytelling as well as a bit of twisted dark fantasy.

The Folio: Black Label #6 will complete the 'adventure path' of the trilogy, culminating with the salvation or ultimate destruction of the prize that has been sought by the adventuring party since the events of The Folio: Black Label #4.  In this adventure, the characters will continue to try to retrieve a stolen noble before she is taken through the gates of the Burning City.  They must brave a slaver camp and then enter the final keep before the gates, the home to the cursed Succubus who has engineered this plot since the beginning.

Taking a page from the previous Black Label Trilogy, this one is going to have an even more adult edge than can found in the standard Folio, and yes, there might be some nudity, and maybe some horror, and maybe a twisted quality here or there, but at the base its really just about the unfettered fun of hacking and slashing your way through a pulp style adventure with blatant evil doers, magical treasures, and exposed flesh.  

So, I'm throwing out the standard politically correct playbook, and turning the flux capacitor back to the early days of gaming.  I hope some of you will join me. 

 

Who is this adventure for?: It will be based around  classic AD&D gaming mechanics, while also have 'grey' stat and  treasure blocks for 5th Edition D&D,  so it is easily playable in  BOTH formats.  It has been designed for  6-8 characters, roughly 2nd  through 4th, and will include incredible maps and artwork that will get your creative juices flowing!   Just check out some of the maps below for what will be awaiting you.

What does the adventure Before the Necrotic Gate revolve around? Well, this will be a standard swords & sorcery based adventure that deals with the a three level keep you see above, located in the deadly 'ash lands'.  Characters will be required by an outside contract to return the daughter of a noble that fell victim to the roving slavers, bound for The Burning City.  The question will be, can the characters get in and out before the entire land rises up against them?

Is there any other background on the setting? Yes, we here at Art of the Genre produced a 544 page novel with attached setting gazetteer in the back.  If you like dark (and erotic) fully illustrated fantasy, then The Burning City will put you on the right path to fully enjoy the setting we are creating in this new adventure module trilogy.  However, after two successful campaigns, The Burning City print run is almost sold out, so limited quantities remain!

*TRADEMARK DISCLAIMER

"D&D" and "AD&D" are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, LLC. Art of the Genre is not affiliated with Wizards of the Coast LLC. We make no claim to, or challenge to, such trademarks

story:
Golazo is the action packed football board game - easy to learn, but with real tactical depth. Our pre-match warm up is complete and Golazo is now ready to make its debut on your table.

Golazo provides the perfect balance of luck and skill. Win the dice roll and move your counters tactically around the pitch; will you dribble past the defenders, put it out wide for a cross, or find the killer pass that your opponent didn't spot?

Now you're in on goal, can you hold your nerve and beat the keeper...

 

Golazo is easy to access: the rules can be picked up in a few minutes and players are always involved.  Gameplay is fast paced, capturing the excitement of a real football match. End-to-end action keeps you on the edge of your seat throughout the whole game.

Players roll a dice to earn moves.  These moves provide the basis for the gameplay... 

 

 

 
 

Every game will come with a custom Golazo dice, featuring the Golazo ‘G’ icon to enhance your gaming experience.

Powercards are added to the action card deck for use during normal gameplay. Keep them secret from your opponent and use them with devastating effect to help you win the match.

 

The First Edition Golazo board game includes 6 kit variations as standard (11x3 front and back), but you can increase your options with our add-on player token sets.

Each add-on includes 36 player counters (3x Goalkeepers, 30x players and 3 spares), printed front and back, giving you 6 kit variations in each set.

We have created four sets, each with different team colour combinations - Pride, Skill, Passion and Flair. Grab all four sets to get the complete Golazo experience.

Coming soon...

Add an extra layer of depth and excitement to your game with Manager cards. Our ten managers each have a distinct style using 3 special ability cards to be deployed with devastating effect. The set of 30 Manager cards will be included in our pledge manager.

 

After the campaign ends, we will collect information and charge shipping separately through our pledge manager. We are estimating that Golazo will be ready to ship by early 2021. So with some contingency, we're aiming to get your copies out to you by May 2021, but we'll be doing everything we can to make things happen ahead of time. Below, you'll find our estimated costs for shipping:

 

 

This is our first time publishing a game - Our team comes from a range of backgrounds, bringing expertise from many different areas. We believe that with our combined skill set we will be able to handle any challenges that might arise in this project.

We have spent over two years refining Golazo and carefully planning for this campaign. We have had a small batch of games produced and have thoroughly playtested. We have everything in place and are ready to scale this up into full production.

Our mantra is to be as clear and transparent as possible. We do not take our backers for granted, and will keep you up-to-date with our progress as much as possible throughout the whole project.

Thank you for your support!
